If, like me, you need to balance your job and college life but still want to play games, this console is a really great choice. It's loaded with tons of pick-up-and-play games that are great for quick 30 minute sessions. The handheld mode makes it really accessible and portable, and the new model has a great battery life. My only big complaint is that the controllers when in handheld mode don't always feel securely attached to the sides of the console. There is a small amount of wiggle if you move the console that is not really enough to bog down the experience, but is still noticeable enough to feel sort of cheap. Overall though this is a great console for a busy young adult still trying to find time for their favorite hobby and I highly reccomend it if you're interested.

We bought this switch for our daughter for Christmas. Got it early so we can load it up with some cool games before Christmas morning. We are so excited to see her face when she opens this present! Best gift idea ever!!!

This system is awesome! I love that it can be carried around and used as a personal game system or I can pop it into its dock and play on a big screen. It's extremely easy to set up, to use, and to play.I bought the year long Family Subscription to Nintendo Online and each of my kids has their own profile. They can take turns playing alone, or quickly jump in on a shared game.

You will never understand the hell I went through to obtain this relic. While it was hell in the moment, I can now look back at those memories of hunting this down with my girlfriend. Feels like we accomplished an impossible task, and will forever have a story attached to it.Me: 2 - Scalpers: 0
awful condition. don't waste your time buying it used; just go ahead and get it new

This system is such a gem. I love everything about it and love playing it with the kids. My son loves playing Mario Odyssey and figuring out all the puzzles. We always go on Power Moon adventures. This system is versatile and allows for so much fun time. It’s also something that the whole family can take part in.The battery life is great and we can get hours and hours of playing time on one charge. The controller that it comes with is easy to use, but I prefer just using it handheld style.

Notice how people who have verified purchases have only given 5-star reviews (as of this writing on 18 March 2020). This is for a reason.I love this system. It is the most beautiful combination of the Switch backing, Joy-Cons, and dock that Nintendo has ever released for the Switch. The overall design, especially Nook and the Nooklings on the dock, is so cute and the pastel colors for the Joy-Cons, like all other Joy-Con colors, look so much better in person. I'm so happy to be a huge fan of Animal Crossing and receive such a beautiful Switch.

I got this for my 11-year-old daughter for Christmas and she LOVES it. Turns out my 5-year-old and husband enjoy playing on it as well! It's not a nice size screen and it's really cool that you can play it on the go or hook it up and play on the TV. You do need to make a Nintendo account, though, if you don't already have one in order to play on it, but overall set up was easy and didn't take too long. While the system was expensive it was definitely worth the investment! I do suggest getting a case to keep it in to keep it safe when not in use, though.

The console arrived quicker then expected, everything was in great shape. My only gripe is that all these sellers are scalping hard for switches everywhere. I understand its business, but this is low for all sellers on this site. How long can you expect to keep this going? The console itself is an amazing thing, but a near $500 upmarket price is not what its worth, bottom line.

One of my switch Joy con  cannot work, cannot charge, the other one work fine. I contact the customer service, they cannot fix it and change it for the covid 19, they said their customer service is closed, and will contact me when it open, till now not response at all. But I donot want to return it for the specially time,  my kids already play it. Very sad.

I am so happy i pulled the trigger and treated myself to this little beauty; I deserve it. I love the way it looks. I love how quickly it arrived. I love how well it was packaged. This unit arrived in perfect condition. This is my first experience with the Switch, so I don’t know enough about it yet in order to make a valid review. However, first impressions; I am happy I got it.

This is the longer lasting battery version, which makes for great portable fun. Good sized memory card, and you're ready to go with multiple kid and family friendly games.The only bad thing is you cant buy the old classic games like on the switch, instead you have to subscribe to a monthly service- but you have access to a lot more games thru the subscription.  I dont know, that's a toss up.

I really love this Nintendo Switch. It is a lot of fun, although all the games are separate so coming right out of the package there is not a lot to do unless you already have games or subscribe to the online version (which is only like $20 a year, so not too bad). My only complaint is that there weren't really any instructions so I had no idea what I was doing at first to set it up, but I figured it out. I love that it can be played individually like a handheld game, or on the tv with a group.

The switch is a great console. if you want to read a review of it read some other ones. I want to talk about the seller "PartyPieces inc." The switch is sold out everywhere right now. I was able to find this one listed with a 7-day shipping turnaround ( versus months like other listings ). I'm happy to say it took only one day extra for me to receive the product. eight days total. I am extremely pleased with sellers honesty and fast turnaround time. highly recommended seller.

I received the discontinued Switch for twice the cost of the new one. When I opened the box the controller mount already had a gouge in it, the joycons thumb sticks do not sit in their proper position so the character in the games you play are always moving when you do not want them to, and to top it all off the system over heats within 10min of use. I did my research and moved it to an open air location and even at one point had a floor fan pointed directly at it with no success. Do not buy this product.

I’ve had my Switch for about a year now and I can say it’s a very fun console. It’s no where near as powerful as the PS4 or Xbox but the fact that I can take my games on a road trip or play it at home is pretty awesome and convenient for gamers. The Joy-Cons do get loose however over time and will slide off without having to press the release button so I would recommend getting a grip or a case like the picture shown above. Another thing I wan to mention is the joy con drift, which can get really annoying at times. Having to calibrate them in the settings menu every other minute can be really annoying and for others, ruin the experience. I usually use a pro controller while playing on docked mode and I don’t run into any issues but the problem persists when I’m playing on table top or handheld. Besides the minor inconvenience here and there, I think the Nintendo Switch is great, especially with third party games like Skyrim or the Witcher 3 being ported over to the Switch. It’s a great little console.
I enjoy the switch but the animal crossing game is not fun at all. Decent value with this package, but not for me.
Battery life is really extended, it later about 5 hours in Zelda

Nintendo's handheld genius has matched their console experiments to create the Switch. I use it mostly in handheld mode but docking it is seamless. It has a lot of games for me to enjoy, a lot of games for non-gamers to enjoy, and games that entire groups can enjoy. It feels like the best console I've ever owned.Between the Nintendo 1st party titles like the amazing Zeldas (Breath of the Wild and Link's Awakening) the many top-notch indie games that are flooding the Nintendo shop (Gris, Transistor, Indivisible) - I'm a content gamer.

It was so difficult to find the Switch since everyone is stuck at home... this item was supposed to get here between April 1-8 but it got here on March 27!  So excited...especially when having an only child stuck in the home for an extended period of time...came w hdmi chord and controller too.  Thank you, Thank you!  Saved my sanity!

With all this quarantine. I should have known to buy this product waaaayyyyy before all of it. But, I've been very desperate into wanting a switch and I finally had the time and money ( yes its outrageously expensive, but it's a definite need if you haven't bought one yet).Received mine two days after I placed my order, and fell in love the moment I opened the package.  I've always been a BIG fan of Animal Crossing since the Gamecube version come out ( I still play it at times ) and honestly, having this makes me very happy! So, thank you so much for still having this up!!!
cool, another idiot trying to sell this for double it’s price.

I am happy with the switch so far. I've been having a great time playing Breath of the wild and Super Smash Brothers. Using stock informer, I was able to get 2 units shipped from Amazon LLC. At first when I paid it stated it would take 3 weeks till delivery. Then it updated and arrived with in 3 days both time I ordered units in June and July 2020. Be patient and just keep refreshing the web page after being notified. They drop multiple units a day.

Honestly one of my best purchases of the year. It is so portable; you can attach it to your TV or take it on the go in console form. I only have bought one game, Animal Crossing, but I have enjoyed my purchase so much. It is out of stock so often so I recommend setting a stock alert so you don't have to pay for an up-charge.

Best game system for a party environment on the market. Great local multiplayer games for all ages. However it is not worth the money to pay above retail for this. I would wait until it is in stock to purchase one of these at regular retail prices not these bloated resell prices.

There are not many games worth playing on the Switch. If you have kids your probably ok but as an adult, I quickly got tired of Animal Crossing. Legend of Zelda is good, but there is not much else besides 7 different Mario titles and Super Smash Bros. My take: don't get this system unless you really like the nostalgia of these older franchises or have kids.

I thoroughly enjoy the size, versatility, and portability of this product! Easily one of the best handheld devices ever manufactured. Nintendo has completely out classed their competition with this wonderful piece of machinery that is guaranteed to have you busy for hours. And this is coming from a die-hard Sony fan :). The sleek but comfortable design of the joycons makes intense gameplay surprisingly seamless. Their massive game selection ranges from AAA titles, to RPGs, First Person Shooters, and MUCH MORE. There is so much more that could be said, however, it’s too much to type! Lol. If you’re looking for an excellent game console that you can play either casually or continuously, look no further. Additionally, if you’re like me (frugal) and you’re on the fence about shelling out the money, don’t be; it’s worth every penny. Also, this seller moved my shipping up to one day shipping FOR FREE!!! Literally the BEST SELLER I have ever had the pleasure of interacting with. Would definitely order from this seller again. Do yourself a favor and buy the switch!

The product is fine and the shipping was fast.  However, the box was not sealed which indicates that somebody opened the box.  I ordered this to make sure and get the newer switch with the longer battery life and also to get another dock.  I have not done so yet, but I will be checking to make sure that somebody did not switch an old switch of the new switch in my "brand new"  open box.  It seems quality control was lax here.

Switch (main screen portion) was warped upon receipt. The back side slightly bulged out while the screen side was concave and bent inward. I’ve never seen this issue before on another Switch. Didn’t realize this problem until a few days after receiving when I was installing a screen protector on the Switch. Set up a return and replacement of the Switch through Amazon. I assume this issue is simply a manufacturer defect and hope the replacement doesn’t have the same problem.

Very Impressed with the depth of this special edition, In the past, the previous Special Editions have been cool, But I feel this one surpasses them all, The two-tone Joy-Cons are great, As is the Dock and backplate. The Joycon holder is about the same as other switches, Just a basic black. But Everything else is great!

I bought this for my younger sister as a Christmas present, along with Zelda BoTW and a SanDisk drive. She loves it!! I love how intuitive it is to learn the controls, she had the hang of it in no time, and being able to play looking at the switch screen OR play looking at a monitor/TV is soo nice. The battery life is great too, it charges perfectly fine with a portable charger, or wall charger. Cannot wait to see what Nintendo brings us in the 2020s.

The coronavirus shortage is incredible. I  searched everywhere for 2 months and didnt want to pay the markup from third party sellers who were going for $500. I finally was able to order from amazon for $299.99 but on a 8 weeks delay. I placed the order and to my surprise it came in less than 2 weeks. Now on the console itself i give it 5 stars even though i wish it had more built in memory. My kid loves it. It's portable, so you can take it anywhere. The online gaming ecosystem though is build to milk you like a cow so one less star for that. Like most/all games are exclusive  and very expensive.

I come from PC and PlayStation gaming. The guys at work all talked about the switch and convinced me to get one. I got to say it's really cool. Great screen and very portable. Games library is not huge, but enough to be worth it. The hardware is not a powerhouse, but it doesn't need to be for these games. I wouldn't play Skyrim on it, or make it my only system, but it is a great addition.

Good battery life, nice screen. The kickstand is very flimsy, and the dock is way too large to be portable.Grip is the worst thing about this system, both when using it in handheld mode and a single joycon.

Our 4-1/2 year old loves it!!  We knew she was a little young for it but she needed something to fill a little time during the day.  She stays busy doing activities and school type work but she needed some downtime that wasn’t just watching TV.  This is perfect.  Paw Patrol game was perfect for her to start learning how to play video games.  Since then, she has graduated to a Yoshi game that has her problem solving.  She only spends about 30-45 minutes On it a day, total.  We also downloaded some coloring books and puzzle games.  She loves those.  Highly recommend but watch the screen time.

I finally found a new Nintendo Switch on Amazon. I wasn’t happy how the price for a basic gray one was double the price, but I hoped for that price everything would be working perfectly. It was brand new in the original box and wrapping. Unfortunately, both joy cons have an issue with on button that it doesn’t work everytime you press the B and Down button.

I didn't think I'd like the switch after buying one for my son and seeing him play it. He said he liked it and I was still stuck on my WiiU.  However, I'm loving it right now! I love the handheld game that you can take with you if you would like and I love the console that I can play on my big if I'd like a. The only drawback is the little controller holder is quite small said sometimes uncomfortable if you play for extended periods. Other than that, I haven't found a flaw :)

Love this! I hate video games yet I have played and actually enjoy it! I bought for my 12 year old daughter but had to buy 2 more controllers as my 3 and 4 year old boys play as well! Didn’t think they would be able to but they love it and actually comprehend how to play! Great game for the family and for all ages! Little kids and adults! Even my mom (grandma) played along!
Took a while to restock. Very hard to get. Looks very well in hand.

Absolute blast of a system. It is a genius design and the games are fun. I love table top mode where I can play Super Smash Brothers with other people or Mario party. It is a 3 in 1. A home console for the TV, a portable gaming device, and mini TV in itself. Not the most powerful console but it is definitely one of my favorites due to its features, comfort, and games.

The Nintendo Switch that I purchased arrived today and unfortunately, was returned today due to it being defective. It was advertised as a Nintendo Switch in brand new condition. However, the error code that displayed on the screen upon turning it on indicated otherwise. I called Nintendo to troubleshoot, but the switch was so defective that while trouble shooting it completely shut off and wouldn’t turn back on – not even to display the error code. The Nintendo representative assumed that I had this switch for quite some time because these are issues that any “brand new” switch shouldn’t have.

I didn't want to buy this for my kid.  I thought the wii u he had was just fine.  But when Christmas rolls around and your kid begs...glad we bought it.  It's fun, versatile, and works great.  I made him hook it up to a tv so he isn't staring at a super small screen.  His friends come over and bring their switch and they play together.  He can bring it over to a friends house which is pretty cool.  Great buy.

So, I honestly wasn't sure whether I should buy this or not since I've never played an Animal Crossing game before New Horizons. However, it has quickly become my most played game on the switch and it is so awesome to be able to play it on a system that looks this gorgeous. I don't know if this will go back in stock but I would recommend this to any Animal Crossing fans out there. My favorite part is definitely the island etchings on the back!Do not support scalpers!! I bought this system for $300 dollars and scalpers are out there trying to sell it for more than twice of the MSRP! If no one buys from them they will have no choice but to lower the price to a more reasonable level.

Received it Saturday which was super fast considering all that’s going on. My dtr played it the whole weekend. She loves it! She wanted a grey but received a color one. They sent a card of apology and $10! So thoughtful. She was happy just to get one cause they are all gone in the store. A little pricey but we all pinched in so should could have it. Worth it!

Really well designed, sturdy and very fun to play solo or with my wife and kid. Mario Kart 8 I think we are up to now and loads of nostalgic fun. I 3d printed handheld controller grips for when we use the joycons for two players separately! Much more comfortable with big hands than holding the single joycon sideways. Really happy all around with the Switch.

Absolutely perfect!  Sure it was overpriced and all that but it’s worth every single penny!  I wanted this so bad and they were sold out everywhere. Glad a found one from a reputable store that arrived fast. I’m spending the next few months of quarantine building my animal island!

Finally found one used one night at 2am and bought it. Was listed as acceptable condition, but the system and accessories looked like it was in "Like New" condition. Been wanting one, but all these price gougers were making it impossible. So far so good. I haven't had any issues that I've seen with the Switch itself. Only thing I have noticed is that there is already joy con drift on the right joy con. Absolutely worth the wait for the right price. Me and the family are really enjoying it during the quarantine.

This is my second Nintendo switch for my 2 kids. They get to play together at the same time either on TV or on the switch itself in seperate room. One thing that really makes me upset is the digital/download games. You can't download a game in one console (primary) and download the same game in the other console (different profile/account). Nintendo might have found a loophole to prevent losing more money by forcing people to buy second game for second console. Every game must be purchased two times for both Switches if they want to play together. Overall, Nintendo Switch console is worth it.
The price is a rip off, i did not get a power cord or HDMI cable hell for the price they could of added a game or two.

Long story short, 17 years ago, my mom sat on Animal Crossing for the Gamecube and played 8 hours straight until she got the gold statue before me. I was 15 years old, and upset.So when this console came out, I bought it for her as her reward for beating me all those years ago.

AMAZING! Iv been wanting a Nintendo switch for a whole Nile now because my older brother just got one and I wanted to be able to play with him since I haven’t seen him in a while. The problem was that all these sellers are taking advantage of this pandemic to make an extra few bucks. THANK YOU AMAZON for not price gouging. I was able to get this switch for the regular 300 dollars and I received it sooner than I expected! I would give it 6 stars if I could. A little note, the red Joy-Con seems to be a little more neon pink than red which I personally love! But I’m pictures it comes out looking red which is funny. Loving my switch so far!!!

You have the catch amazon because the prices change consistently! After checking 3 times a days for a week i finally caught the price at original price! I received mines today. Brand new. Newer model (-01). Very happy! Shipping was first estimated to be in Oct and after a week my switch was shipped out.

Pretty disappointed with the fact that I could find game sold separately anywhere in the sale s ad, so I assumed due to the huge price tag and the fact that animal crossing is all over the box that it came with it. Very unhappy! I feel purposely mislead.

This thing is Awesome, its a portable handheld and home console....its so much fun. I am currently playing the legend of Zelda and the graphics are so nice. The controllers are kinda not that great so I recommend also buying an actual controller. Other than that everything else works great, battery life is very good and the quality of the screen is nice.
530 for a product that is normally 299 is not ok especially when it’s used .....

Purchased for December 2019 gift for my 8 year old. Great fun playing hand held and in game console mode.Sent for repair bc crouch button he said did not work and the sound jack was loosing connections. Tested on multiple headsets.

Let's just admit you can't really go wrong with Nintendo. My husband loved the colors, loved the way he could play with a single large controller or smaller one, and he appreciated that I had the foresight to purchase the one that offered extended battery life.

Haven't own a Nintendo console since the Wii. I really wanted something I could play bowling, tennis, Mario etc and after finally pulling the trigger I can say 100% I'm in love with the Switch. My wife and I play every single night and it's great to bring on trips. I wish it was easier to travel with and you didn't need the dock and could just use a USB-C to HDMI but other than that even if you're a casual gamer this is a must have.

I took a break from gaming consoles before I got this. My last home system was a PS3 and my last handheld was a Nintendo DS. I couldn’t find any games I was really into or anything that seemed worth my time. I got the Switch after having seen my friends using it and after a few minutes of playing Breath of the Wild. Let me tell you.... this system is wonderful!! You’re really getting two systems in one!! Being able to play on the go as well as just plug and play is such a wonderful concept. Not to mention the game options and variety. I’ve played over 70 hours of Breath of the Wild, and loved it. The other indie games available are also great additions. Overall, it’s a great system. Worth every dollar. I haven’t had this much fun with a gaming system in a while. Great job, Nintendo!!!

Everything is in perfect order when it arrived. Though I didn’t know it would have to be charged upon arrival. Was looking forward to playing it as soon as everything was hooked up to the television, but I had to use handheld mode which made it die while setting up! Minor gripes aside, it’s a great console. We all know this. $20 for the worst online gaming service on the market is a bit much for me though.

This console is beautiful! I'm not a huge Animal Crossing fan but the new game did catch my eye even more when this Switch was announced. The pastel colors really work on the Switch, along with the design on the back. What really tempted me to buy this specific one was that it is the second version of the Switch. Which of course includes better battery life. I'm sure you've heard this all before, so I won't go any longer. It's a very pretty console and if you have your chance to get your hands on it for the normal market price. I'd suggest that you go for it!

Great Christmas present for a 4yr old. I tested it before wrapping it and putting it under the tree and everything was setup perfectly. I could not be happier but the price was a little steep but it’s is what it is. I bought it because my 4yr old asked for it and I spoil him and he already has an iPad MINI but he wanted a switch because his cousin has one. Go figure! So far so good! I hope it lasts a long time for him.

My switch came in a lot earlier than I was expecting it to so I am over the moon with that! Not to mention that it came in perfect condition (I bought it in New condition but was feeling a little suspicious about it, not going to lie) Everything is working wonderfully right now so I really can't complain at all about the product itself. I definitely paid WAY too much for it (over $500 with tax) but if you're looking for a switch now in this quarantine time, you'll know there's a serious shortage of available consoles. All in all, definitely recommend buying if you're as impatient to get it as I was.

I bought this just to play Animal Crossing: New Horizons, and it didn't disappoint in the least! It's incredibly fun!One cool feature is that if you set up Parental Control using the free app, it will tell you how long you've played each day. Since I'm neither a parent nor do I need to be controlled, I disable restrictions and play-time limit so it doesn't actually interfere when I'm playing, but it is a bit sobering to see that yesterday I played for 6 hrs and 40 min.

I love my Nintendo switch! With new ones not being available I saw this used/open box one on there and thought it was worth a shot. I feel like I really scored on this one. It was pretty much brand new, even the packaging was protecting everything that was in the box wasn’t even disruptive. So if you need one and see a used Prime one available, go for it, for the price you can’t go wrong...

I bought this Nintendo Switch from this Seller. It was an Extra $145.00 than the original Retail Price of $300.00, but I believe that was because of the Switch Shortage that happened everywhere due to COVID-19. The actual Product I received was top notch though. It was packaged very well. I didn't have a problem opening it which I have had with some other Products which actually lead to me accidentally damaging those items. But no such problem here. The actual Switch itself was also in perfect condition. No scratches anywhere on any of it. And nothing was missing. It runs perfectly fine too. Nothing wrong with it whatsoever. I am very happy with it. The only downside, like I said, was the Price, but is understandable given the Pandemic and Shortage. So I'm giving this Five Stars. Great job!!

I’ve had a Nintendo Switch before, but I just replaced it and it came today! No damage was done to the console or any of the accessories inside as I got it out. Feels just as I remember it. I’m sooo excited to be playing Zelda again! The only thing I was unhappy about was that the delivery guy didn’t follow instructions I left to knock and ring doorbell. It was also raining and the step he left the packages on were getting wet. So I spent $320 on this just so it could have potentially gotten ruined if I hadn’t seen the truck or got a notice it had been delivered. Other than that, I love it!!! Highly recommend!!!

I've been looking to get a Switch for a while and thought that I had missed out due to the limited pandemic stock.  Thanks Amazon for letting me purchase the device at the proper retail value rather than getting gouged.  The product itself is well made, but I feel that the dock is rather cheap.  I would also have liked a longer power cord.
It could be that I over looked it, but I wouldn't had bought it for the insane price had I known it was used.... but works fine and seemed brand new when I unboxed it.

We bought this for our son's birthday and we haven't had it for even a year yet and it seems there is a hardware issue. We tried to use three different microSD cards (even the ones manufactured by Nintendo) to add more memory, but none of them worked. Formatting wasn't even an option. We kept getting error messages. I scoured the internet and used every troubleshooting option to no avail. We have only been able to use this Switch very minimally and is now being repaired by Nintendo since it is still under warranty. Also, because of a back up in repairs (due to Covid-19) we won't have it back for a couple months. Wish I could give it a raving review.

Buying a $300 item on amazon is terrifying! but this was our Christmas gift for my wife's parent and they loved it! it saved us time at the store and it was the perfect gift for them.- Package arrived on time

My oldest son wanted one of these last Christmas, but didn't get one...so my younger son decided he should have it for his birthday.  HE LOVES IT!!!!  All the games he USED to play when HE was 12 and 13....
I was expecting a single game with the bundle but looks like it’s only console with one controller... how we need to suppose to play with two persons.

Here is an actual product review, not an opinion on the sellers business ethics. To start, I bought this solely because it's the limited edition version. It does not come with the animal crossing game however, so keep that in mind. The product is exactly as advertised and was completely new and unused. Absolute perfection. The price is not ideal, but Amazon has amazing financing options. So overall it's a beautiful device and so very cute. I definitely don't regret buying.

-1 Star because I hate price gougers, and I normally wouldn't ever support them for something like this, but I was behind the bus on the news about the release on this switch edition and decided if I was going to spend more on it I'd rather do it while it's still reasonable seeing as I was already spotting $700 ones which is outrageous. On another note the item came in pristine condition and as expected is very cute.

The perfect console for all ages. Having grown up with Nintendo consoles, this system brings back my fondest memories with an innovative twist. I love the “switch” capability of being able to pick up the console right from the dock without interrupting the gameplay. There are so many fantastic titles exclusive to the Switch, which makes for many hours of nonstop enjoyment. This is one of Nintendo’s best systems yet, and I’m excited for what’s to come next.

Nintendo exceeded my expectations with this console, the portability, the quality of the games, the graphics and everything else about it is so great that you wouldn't be able to find any of these things on any other console, I've only played a few hours on Nintendo switch's exclusive games like Mario Odyssey or breath of the wild but even by playing 2 hours with these games you can see how much effort and care went into these games, especially with Mario odyssey.I can't recommend this console enough.

Since the COVID-19 pandemic, Nintendo Switch has been in incredibly high demand. To have been able to purchase one successfully through a reliable seller (Techool (Seller Fulfilled Ships Fast)), is a blessing. It is pricer now but well worth it, especially while playing and staying at home. It arrived new and in perfect condition. Very happy and pleased with my purchase. Highly recommend!

This system is so much fun to use. Battery life is great- the first night I had it I played for almost 6 hours with no issue. It switches seamlessly from handheld to docked. Good price for what you get.

My son absolutely loves his switch! Money well spent.  Kids are HARD to entertain these days.  I found the switch a great alternative to a number of things he COULD be doing.... drugs, drinking, thuggery.  Although at 18 I’m thinking a job might be a good idea.  Hard to find work when your skills include; gaming, cuteness, extremely tall, did I mention the gaming?  Anyway, at least this keeps him at home, safe and out of trouble.  😉

Happy with the product.  This is the revision with the improved battery life, which is a noticeable improvement.  It also has slightly higher brightness and truer color compared to the past model due to a display upgrade.  The only flaw to be aware of is the dock can scratch the screen, which makes a screen protector a must-have.

So far I am not impressed. Using the console in tablet form for setup is annoying. The thing won’t connect to WiFi. We are going to restart the internet. If it still doesn’t work, we might have to return it .Update : didn’t work. So now I am spending 36 dollars on a usb Ethernet adapter . Ridiculous . Garbage product

I'm satisfied with this, nothing crazy about it.  Doesn't come with the game or anything like that, just some extra decorations.  It costs the same as a normal switch retail so you can't be mad.  If you're an animal crossing fan I would definitely purchase this, if you're not, just go for the normal one, as the special edition is selling over the price of a normal switch on the second hand market.  Works great and as expected from a Nintendo product.

Le equipo funciona muy bien y sin fallas en mi caso particular el equipo llegó en una caja de Amazon  todo en una bolsa plástica con otro pedido que vino tinto con eso sin la caja original y sin manual la caja de Amazon era más pequeña que la caja del Nintendo no entiendo cómo sele ocurrió hacer eso al que realizó el empaque hice el reclamó y si Amazon se ofreció a qué realizará la devolución pero era navidad y era un regalo para mi sobrino y tuve que dejarlo así

Great product. Ordered it in the morning, 5 hours later was at my door. We live in beautiful times.Definitely recommend getting a Switch with colored joycons like this one, the black ones are dull and these Red/Blue ones retail for up to $80. Comes with everything you need except a carry case (which I would recommend instead of putting in your backpack lose) as well as picking up a good sized Micro SD card. I got like a 200gb one for $30-40 so I will never lose one of the tiny came cartridges.

I had never played an Animal Crossing game before, but after seeing all of the trailers, I knew I had to have it.  I used NowInStock's website to get the red and blue for MSRP about 2 months ago, and have been having a blast with it ever since.  My boyfriend liked it so much he got one from GameStop about 3 weeks ago.  We could not be happier!
I bought this for my Grandkids for Xmas, so happy I got today!! Thanks Amazon as always.  This is what they wanted.  I will update after Christmas.  I love gaming stations.

The product seems pretty good so far. Smaller than I thought as I had never actually seen the device, but the screen is clear, and the first game we bought (Mario karts) had fantastic clear graphics.Controllers are very small and awkward. We might get the more traditional controllers to replace the funny little joy cons.

Got this right before Christmas so our short family vacation during the holiday.  I use it at home and away.  We've got two extra controllers so the whole family can play together games like Mario Party, Mario Kart and etc.  I own several Nintendo game consoles like GameCube and Wii.  I think Nintendo’s switch is the most incredible system they’ve ever designed.

The Nintendo switch is a good console the only thing i have a problem with is the dock. When i try to connect the switch to the dock i have trouble trying to project the screen on the TV. I need to balance the console perfectly until the green light is solid. It is very annoying having to do this every time i want to play with friends on the big screen. I hope it is not a defect in my system. I would wait until a newer version comes out for it.

Product came the first day of the projected arrival timeframe which was an exciting surprise! Packaging was USPS in a sturdy USPS box and taped very well with "do not break seal" type packaging tape which I really appreciated. Product came as advertised in Nintendo box, brand new, all main gaming system components and accessories still in plastic wrap and scratch resistant wrap. I'm very very happy with this purchase!! It was purchased as a gift to a family member as a way to help with the stress of all that's going on and I couldn't be happier with my order! Thank you!

I am absolutely smitten with the design. Love the white and minimalistic dock, the muted green and blue controllers that are still bright enough to give a pop of color in light. I wish the bezel of the unit was white instead of black to continue the aesthetic, but I love the etched designs on the back regardless. Very easy to set up with my TV by following instructions on the console.

My son is obsessed with his Switch. I bought this one to play it on the tv, but he mostly uses it as a handheld. I do believe I've gotten my money's worth though since he plays it almost every day. I do suggest getting a screen protector though if you plan to use it as a handheld device. You can find a 3ok for under $10 on Amazon

I pretty much like the console. In portable mode, the ergonomics are quite good and the controls fall naturally under the fingers. The buttons are quite small and close together but you get used to it very quickly.  In Salon mode, nothing special, the console defends itself well, and the graphics are excellent for a console of this range.  A quick note on the parental control application which is also very practical and which lets you know how long players are using the console per day. Only one regret, however, the daily limit of playing time applies to the operation of the console and not to the time per player. Difficult to enforce equity between mhy childrens. Apart from that, excellent console.

This saved me from going crazy in quarantine.  I bought this right before it all happened and this is all I do to keep my mentally okay.  I virtually see my friends and change my island constantly with Animal Crossing.

I've been putting off buying a Nintendo switch for myself until they made an animal crossing game for it. It turns out that my patience has paid off! This is one of the most aesthetically pleasing special edition consoles in my opinion. The pastel colors on the side and the off white color of the base gives it a nice tropical and island vibe. The details on this are amazing as well! They even go as far as to make little islands on the back of the tablet iself. I am completely satisfied with this and more!

So I love my switch for game nights but this day in age given what phones can do I struggle to think this is worth price. Couple that with how expensive games are this just makes it even harder to justify getting it. In hindsight I definitely regret investing in the price of the unit and the high cost of the games. The games in my note 10 are just as good.

I was not a believer. I'm a PlayStation guy...have been since PS1. Finally broke down and scooped up a Switch. This thing is a game changer. I never thought I would WANT to play a game in bed. Now I can't stop. Being able to play on my big screen TV and then continue the game anywhere else is something I never knew I would enjoy doing but it really is amazing. And the amount of exclusive titles seals the deal - Breath of the Wild is one of the best games ever made, Smash Bros Ultimate and Mario Kart are perfect for big groups hanging out.It's worth every penny.

Exactly as we expected. Packaged in a brand new box. My family has enjoyed this system more than any of the others that we've had. It's been pretty easy to setup accounts, implement parental controls,  and even purchase games. The portability is probably why it's used more than any other system.

This looks so cute and soft. I love it very much.Works fine. Currently waiting for the game so I cannot say much about battery life and performance of the console in general. But I guess it will be fine.

This is the cutest console I’ve ever laid eyes on. I have a couple of other special edition systems in my house but none of them were so adorably on brand for me as this one.It’s your typical switch. I’m happy with it. The Animal Crossing detail on the back was a fun addition to this one. I’m glad I was able to snag one on release day!

Bought this for the Mrs. for an early Christmas present directly from Amazon. It is the new version with extended battery life. We’ve been taking turns playing Breath of the Wild for hours on end. No complaints whatsoever. Except maybe that I prefer my Xbox controller which can work on it with the Brooks adapter (also on Amazon).

The system came new, packaged great. No issues. Perfect condition and playability. We have been Nintendo buyers since the beginning. We like the family-friendly games that Nintendo offers. The travel ability of this system is also a plus. Everyone in the house loves it. We range from 4 to 46.

A tremendously well designed platform for gaming. I do wish it had more educational abilities so I could blend both education and gaming for my nephew. But given its design intentions, it met all of them spectacularly well! Truly an amazing achievement. Would be nice if it were less expensive.

We are thrilled with our Nintendo Switch. We got Animal Crossing, which I can play online with my daughter (I can visit her island and she can visit mine). We also got the Ring Adventure Fit game and we are getting really good workouts with it! The controls work great and it was easy to use and set up.

Amazing design and I’m in love with the game but the switch has a terrible problem!!! It won’t charge, and it’s been at the same percent despite the charging logo appearing and trying absolutely every method.

Nintendo Switch is just what I thought it would be! Straight entertainment out of the box. System was easy to set up and I was able to be playing within 15 minutes. Directions were easy to follow and controls are similar to previous Nintendo systems. I love that you can play on the go as well as at home on the TV.
Item shipped and arrived next day! Item arrived in mint condition. Box was pristine. Everything is perfect. Excited to use for the first time. 5 star quality.

El producto muy bien , pero en el momento de la compra venía una oferta de $30 dólares de regalo , era sólo una propaganda para llamar la atención al comprador , porque no sé respeto la oferta , era una gran mentira

I understand that many of us like to limit screen time for our kids, but the hand-eye skills kids learn with these child friendly games are very good. Buying these for my nieces and nephews as well. We just don't tell them you can disconnect it from the tv and use them in the car :)
I did in fact get the new one it was unopened and unused when I received it, have had no trouble out of it so far. I love this system.

I have been tracking on this V2 Second Generation Switch for at least six months. I have been trying to find all kind of sources but it seems lots buyers try to stock them and resell in higher value. Maybe amazon and other platforms can only allow one buyer with one product only through their ID. Waiting period was not accurate since it shows will be arrived in October thus the delivery period is not accurate and unorganized timing.
The kids spent their own money on this, and they haven't complained. These video game controls must work fine, or I would be hearing about it.

I got this for my son who is 6. He loves playing it and so do I. The system is amazing in so many ways of using it. Very easy and quick to set up. Easy and quick to switch from TV playing to the Switch console without losing your points in the game. Work great with the internet. The battery life is better than the old version. We really enjoy it.

My daughter asked for this as a Christmas gift. It's easy to set up an account and download the games. I preferred this method instead of buying cartridges. For her convenience, I bought a memory card. She uses the device when we travel, have to use waiting rooms, or similar activities. She can also invite a friend to play since each can use a control, or whatever it's called.

Nintendo has done it again. This is a great product with a lot of variety of games including some with motion control. The apps are a bit lacking compared to say the ps4 so don’t expect a web browser or Plex.Breath of the Wild, Super Smash Bro’s and Mario Kart are the definitive titles (sold separately) and they are really fun for all ages. Of course the biggest appeal of the Switch is the ability to go from TV to portable. The best thing is that when the adults are using the TV the kids can still happily play

My 9 y.o. granddaughter has received this Nintendo Switch as a combination early Easter gift and a staying at home try not to get too bored gift. She absolutely loves it!The seller shipped this and we received it so quickly. I would recommend this seller anytime.

Wow, Nintendo has again leapfrogged the market, hit a niche like the Wii.We bought the Wii for the kids (and the parents) 10 years ago.  Other than replacing some game discs that stopped working due to overuse the Wii has been the best buy ever.

The center console itself was fine - it was actually the newer version (XKW) with longer battery life. However my joycons were very clearly heavily used, and the left one had drift so severe it was useless. It’s not too much of a hassle to get replacement parts from other sellers, but it is frustrating having to wait another week to use my new switch.Aside from the joycon issue, it was packaged nicely and shipped quickly with all parts accounted for. I’m sure once my replacement part comes in I’ll be more than satisfied with this purchase.

I really love this, but my only complaints are that I was supposed to get the gray joycons but I got the red and blue, and that it had a game predownloaded. Idk if that’s how it comes, but it was super easy to delete. So glad I got this, and the color thing is basically a non issue.

Reviewing since I bought this and tons of people who didn't are giving it 1* because of scalpers. Reviews are for the product itself...The Switch is beautiful and detailed and I am so glad that I was able to get one.

Exactly as it was described, and it arrived early. It is still overpriced, but it came in a sealed (but slightly beat up box) and everything came in their original packaging.If you're wondering what it comes with (because I was), it's the console itself, a single set of controllers (joy cons), a controller base for your joycons, the dock for the console so you can play on a TV, an HDMI cable, and a charger.

The Nintendo switch I ordered came about 2 weeks early from when it was supposed to be originally shipped. It works well and is constantly being played by my girlfriend for hours on end. The battery lasts on its own about 6 to 7 hours and makes it easy to play with the family. Was a very great purchase and we love it!!Pros: Everything

this is the console version of driving a lamborghini, honestly gets so much attention due to its exclusivity. really cute pastel colors are very different to anything else we have seen in a switch console and it very pleasing to the eye. I wish it however was more accessible coz at this point i just regret opening this and using it since its so rare. Please restock in large amounts and I would truly give it 5 stars.

Very well done. Kinda taken back at the durability and power of this unit for being a handheld. Was reluctant to buy because I thought it would chintzy but no, this thing is legit. If you have been holding out on getting one of these, dont. Seriously my favorite console now.

My son loves the product BUT the reason I gave it only 3 stars, is because they offered a promotion for a $30 credit/gift card for buying the Switch & when I tried to use it, it came back as invalid & when I contacted Amazon about it, they were useless! So, I was never able to use the $30. Promotion!!

It's adaptability to different scenarios (tv, portable, multiplayer, etc) is really neat. It's getting a decent amount of games found on other systems and PC, and if you have more time to play handheld than in front of a TV, it's pretty neat to be able to play some AAA games wherever I am.
Great system. Kids can’t get enough of it. Can purchase game cartridges or download from the internet. Recommend you buy an additional memory card and screen protector.

It was the best deal available at the time for the version 2 at.$299.99 with a $25 “credit” to your Amazon account. No extra game, just the console. The credit had exclusions so I ended up buying the SD card for the Switch. The kids love it. I think it’s cool.

Prior to purchase, I knew that the Switch was an awesome platform. After purchasing one, it has quickly become my favorite console. The user experience is fantastic, and the game selection is diverse. Playing with friends is super easy, and I would completely recommend this version over the lite since you can remove the joycons.

I love this console's colors so much. It's so pretty! The designs on the back are so nice.But it's not worth a scalper price. I was lucky and got it during Amazon's restock before New Horizons came out.

Nintendo once again putting in minimal work. You literally can’t find these switches anywhere and once they come back in stock they are out of stock before you can get your card information in to order it. I guess I’ll hold off on playing the new animal crossing and other switch games I’ve wanted to buy until Nintendo learns how to mass produce consoles. If you buy from resellers your mom never loved you.

The ordered was delivered as promised. The product comes with the dock, the joy-cons, cables and accessories to play. The Nintendo Switch is just a great hybrid console, having so much fun with it. The screen looks better that the last one. The joy-cons are working without any problem, been playing for about 40 hours now without any issues on the console or any part, if something goes wrong will update this info.Nintendo has a huge library now and since the PS5 and Scarlett come next year, they are like transitioning, this is maybe the best time to get a Nintendo Switch.

Have had system about a month and a half and it is played several hours a per week. The left (blue) controller it came with died during play. Will not charge and will not light up and will not reset. Now have to go through the trouble of sending back for "repair".

This is not due to the product but the outrageous price, my wife really wanted this one and I got it for her because I love my wife and she does so much for me. But AMAZON seriously if you can't do something about scalpers then something is wrong with you.

I finally was able to buy this Nintendo Switch for my kids after weeks of trying. It's really designed well and the graphics are surprisingly good for a portable gaming system. Really impressed. My kids are always fighting to who will use it so at least it's keeping them busy while at home. Wish they had more games available but I'm sure more will come out in the future.

My son is in lower grade of elementary school. Nintendo switch is the best game console for us because many games for kids are exclusive on Nintendo. The console can be used for TV projection or hand hold so it is good for both home and travel. The battery life is good too.

Siempre fui #Fan de otras consolas y quería un cambio para complementar mis días libres, al principio dude en comprarlo por la variedad de juegos! sin embargo, cuenta con muchos clásicos y otros nuevos para no perder nunca la diversión.  Vale demasiado su compra, que quizá el precio podría ser elevado y sus juegos dependiendo el formato pero la compra lo vale. Si compras los accesorios para viajar y protección del mismo tendrás más comodidad para poder utilizarlo sin ningún problema en  cualquier lugar y solo o acompañado de gran entretenimiento

Loved it when it arrived, unfortunately keeps freezing. I am returning it today. I could see once in awhile not twice a week every week or sometimes more. Paid $500, definitely not worth it with issues it's having. Extremely disappointed because my boy really loves it.

Finding a Switch under $500 was like finding disinfecting wipes at Walmart.  I think the extra I spent on it has already paid itself off for me though.  As a whole I like the Switch as much as my PS4, but the added portability puts it over the top.

The docking station of mine doesn’t work. I went online and found out it should be an easy fit. But I did everything they suggested online still don’t work. I have no choice to have it refund. They don’t suppose replacement has to be refund. It will take 7 days after amazon receive the produce to issue the refund. This is the worse experience i had with amazon.
Have had my switch a little over a month and I love it. I don't know why I waited so long. If you're thinking about getting one, the answer is yes, you need it.

Why would you leave a product a one-star review simply because THIRD-PARTY SELLERS are selling it for far more than it's worth? Amazon has no control over how much third-party sellers sell this item for. Knocking down this product's overall review for that reason is ridiculous.All complaints aside, I love this console. It doesn't have any problems with wandering joysticks or the screen being scratched by the dock like older versions of the switch. The animal crossing design and blue/green controllers look very nice. Overall, a worthy purchase.

Finally after days of waiting I was able to buy one for normal price. Didn’t want to pay any scummy scalpers. Nice to be playing a newer solid Nintendo console. Haven’t had any since the ds and wii. Great replacement to those old ones

Very disappointing compared to the Xbox! The monthly subscription only gives you access to the old fashion 80s games, all the other games you have to purchase. My daughter has an Xbox as well and we have the monthly subscription that comes with a load of wonderful games!

I haven’t owned a Nintendo in over 10 years. I purchased this because I wanted to play games with my daughter on her Switch. That said, I now gravitate towards the Switch over my Xbox. There is just something appealing about the Nintendo art style and quality of their games.
gouging

This was the perfect birthday gift for my son. I  Enjoy as well. I also purchased a Nintendo subscription package and was able to get all of the old Nintendo games that I remember growing up with. It is a lot of fun playing the original super Mario brothers with my 12 year old son.

I got this because of the shelter in place. I bought Pokemon Sword first. It's my first system where I am able to play handheld, tabletop or on my T.V. The joycons are very responsive. I haven't had drifting and I hope not yet. I get quite a few hours of gaming from this system before I need to charge. I like playing online with my friends. This system doesn't have to have to have the best-looking games, but it wins out in story and versatility.

I bought this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend. It is worth every penny. It was a surprise and he absolutely loves it. It has so many features and cool games. I'm not much of a gamer but it's so beat especially how the sides come off and become consoles. What blew me away was when he connected it to the tv and played on the big screen. I am so pleased at this purchase and he's over the moon about it.
Original product, arrived on time and in good conditions. It is overpriced but it’s sold out everywhere else. Happy quarantine everybody...

I purchased this Switch as a gift but have had one myself for a while. I generally play it in handheld mode but will occasionally use the dock to connect it to the TV. There is a wide range of games available in the eshop as well as physical titles. The battery life is great (generally 6 or so hours depending on the type of game). The Switch has been exactly what I'd expect from a Nintendo console. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase.

We were supposed to get the switch  in October, but we didn't expect them to arrive so soon. I can buy it on 299.99, which makes me very happy. Several friends around me bought it around 370. Both of us are Nintendo fans and that keeps us from stopping to play games.
Battery drains a lot when not in use. Requires a battery charge whenever fully charged and not used for a couple days.

Arrived with the left speaker blown out and buzzing. I cant help but notice theres not much more to do than game on the switch. No internet browser or media player and no apps like Netflix or Hulu. They have Youtube on there for what its worth. The games available on the machine are excellent! At the end of the day thats what we buy the switch for and if it weren’t for the blown speaker I would have given it 4 stars.

So it finally arrived it. I’m glad I ordered this before the lockdown, it took a long time due customs and delivery on my country but it’s finally here.It’s great, to be honest I was kinda scared but it works great, and of course it’s hard to get a Switch right now, so that makes me even happier because I bought just in time.

I was lucky enough to get an order during the first dispatch of the AC special edition switches. It does not come with the game, and the switch is model 1, not 2, but the switch performs well so I'm happy. The design is very cute and the joycons are (for now) a special edition color limited to just this switch. For being the same price as a regular switch, it's very well worth it!

I had been trying to find a switch ever since quarantine hit, but they were sold out everywhere. This one was about $400 after taxes and shipping, so it was overpriced $100 but it works great and was a lot easier than finding one on offer up. On top of that my delivery was super quick. I would have grave them 5 stars if it wasn't for the price gouge, regardless was worth it.

Came in better condition than anticipated in the description!! No original packaging but that didn’t matter to me as all the parts were there. Was delivered with care. This is almost perfect condition better than expected and works perfectly. Not to mention it wasn’t price gouged which is a PLUS. The only flaw mentioned was where it laid on a conveyer belt you can see tiny black scuffs. Again, that didn’t matter at all. It’s perfect. Thank you!

I love my switch. I was surprised about some of the games offered on the Nintendo store, I never realized the graphics were capable of some of those games (Skyrim, The Witcher 3..etc) battery life is great and it fits comfortably in my hand.

As a hardworking mother, I just wanted to get something nice for my kid. I'd love to get this for her, but not with the insane markup price. I'm sad that most of these consoles will remain unopened and collect dust over the years.

I love it! It came with exactly everything I wanted. I also got my account back on my switch from my family's switch. It doesn't come with a screen protector or extra stuff to let you know. They protected the console really well it was wrapped up in so much bubble wrap.

My granddaughter is so excited to have her Switch. I have never bought a game system that doesn't come with a starter game. That was a great disappointment. Luckily, she likes the cheaper games, so we went out and bought Tetris and Minecraft so she would at least have a few games to start.

I’ve been waiting for years for a limited edition Switch that I would like. I was so excited when I saw pictures of this one and for one my favorite games as well. I couldn’t believe how quickly the preorders sold out. Luckily I was able to purchase this at MSRP when it was restocked. Now I play it every day! I love the pastel colors and the patterned back.

Received my switch in a timely manner. Everything was there and works well.I couldn't find my ac adapter, contacted the seller saying it didn't come with one. Seller responded right away. However, I did find it. It had fallen between the couch and the wall. Very impressed with the quick response.

I have the product however it just stopped working last month and I had no idea what to do it was a gift for my grandson and it stayed at my house so that he had something to occupy his time, he came for a visit recently and attempted to play it and it would not come on if you can tell me what my options are or how I can send it back to the manufacturer I would really appreciate that.

Fun little device for the young and young at heart. Especially for those who are like me and grew up playing Mario and Pokemon. Like the option to switch between handheld and TV mode easily. Probably the most versatile and innovative gaming device currently on the market.

It’s the Nintendo Switch!  This was a present for my 6 year old.  He loves playing on it.  Battery life has noticeably improved over the first one (my 10 year old owns).  Overall looks and plays the same.  Joycons are cross compatible too.

I’m loving the design and everything else about this switch. This is my first time getting a switch so I can’t wait to experience a switch while I play animal crossing on Friday with it. I was lucky enough to grab one off amazon on release day before they sold out. If you can somehow get one without paying more than actual retail price then go for this switch and enjoy this beauty as I have.

The design is brilliant.  Start a game on the TV and then continue on the handheld.  Well made, great battery life (this is the new model).  Get a screen protector since you risk scratching the screen when putting it in the cradle.
my bratty teenage son is happy with it, i dont get the hype, but hey im old so whatever...
I love this! So much fun! Bought it for dead by daylight and have not been disappointed!
The battery life is what left me most impressed, over 10  hours of sitting in front of the screen and the controllers were still going strong.
These things are garbage. Used for 24 hours and already malfunctioning. The controller won't recognize that it's attached to the console.
Love the switch! More fun than I had imagined. Able to play the old games that I loved.
After a few months, I'm noticing joycon drift already. I use it mostly in handheld mode. Battery is superior to the original, but the joycons still suck.

Man, what can I say! Thank you amazon for having a Switch available for my family to purchase. It took a lot of patience and hard work but we've finally gotten up and running playing Super Smash Bros, Mario Kart, and Animal Crossing!This newer version of the switch is slightly better and it's pretty noticeable. We absolutely love it!

I purchase the Nintendo switch for my son for stop Christmas. It has been a great console and he has had a lot of fun interacting on it and taking care of it as well! We have had no issues with it. It has been running great and always remember to make sure it goes in the charging port every night. I have always plug Nintendo and growing up playing it. I am glad to see that they are still switching things up in this new generation. So the counsel can keep going and keep gwtting better!

Got it from amazon, the tablet worked but it didn’t connect to tv. There was an issue with the dock. Nothing wrong with the switch itself but I wanted to play on my tv and there was something wrong. Sent it back to Nintendo and they repaired it for no cost but wished I got a switch that had no problems. Had to wait another 2 and a half weeks to play it. Buy the switch from a store or Nintendo

I went from a PC only streamer to mostly Switch due to having so much fun with it! There’s so many games that have co-op so my community loves to join in! It’s made me a better streamer and it’s made my love for gaming come back even more! A guaranteed must for anyone of any age.

Although the switch was released nearly 3 years ago, this console will be relevant for a very long time. I used to be an avid gamer back in the black and white game boy days and this brings back all the good feels.The graphic are great for a handheld and playing multi-player games on the big screen is a hit when having friends over.
Came fast and wrapped heavily so no damage would come to it. Came with everything listed & there are no obvious scratches. So happy!

I got my package delivered without its own packaging. Absolutely no manual. I can’t get it to go to east coast time. I said to not connect to tv, it wouldn’t allow me to go on. This is for a 5 year old birthday and I can’t even set up. Very unhappy! This was sold as new. What a joke

I got a huge lucky because was 300 usb the Nintendo Switch (+17 bucks from taxes), was brand new and is the 2019 version, HAC-001(-01) in the red box... for those that want to buy the Nintendo switch I recommend to wait because is hard to get one Nintendo Switch at 300 usb, all of them are 350+ usb and that's expensive and not worth it, I just got a good lucky for it when Amazon put it in the store... Thanks Amazon.

We got the Nintendo Switch as a Christmas gift for our girls and they’ve loved it.  Once we realized that there was a first and second generation we are glad to have spent the extra money to get the second generation because a longer battery life is definitely worth it.
Best gife I bought for my husband!!! He brings it everywhere he go. It helps him get through the day

Great console, love the portability of it, been using it for BOTW and Smash and have not been dissapointed. Unfortunately, you might want to wait for the price to drop due to the recent price inflation.

Hello, we have 9 months with the Nintendo and it has a problem to turn in on. If we want to turn it on we have to 🔌 it. As you can see in the video. I am going to try to contact Nintendo so see the one year warranty. The chat is not available, o will try to call them.

My son loves the switch. It is amazing he can play it on the Tv or transition to handheld seamlessly without missing a beat! From the living room to the car without having to stop the race.  He loves mario kart 8
Must have during this stay-home time, adds tons of fun for the family, glad I got one while in stock
This was a Christmas gift for our son. He loved it. He has played  for hours. The console is just the right size. The screen color and clarity is remarkable. It is very comfortable in your hands.
I buy the Nintendo DS on octubre 22 for Christmas for my son , today in Christmas Day he open his present and the Nintendo it’s not working 😔😔😔...We are so upset 😭 with our purchase

Delivered safely and securely. Exactly as described and easy set up. Appreciated the advise from other Amazon parents on which model and serial number to look for in order to obtain the newest system.
Don't understand why the price is so outrageous (luckily I got it for retail), but its just a switch.

the physical device is really nice. The excessively expensive games are not. Why are 2+ year old games still selling for 60 bucks?? Besides that, Amazon's promo during the holidays for a 25 dollar credit is extremely limiting in what it actually applies to. I feel deceived by the lack of transparency, Amazon!
Price gouging and this isn’t even a new item.

Kids opened this and everything looked fine until they put in a racing game and the vehicles just move to the right without hitting any buttons. To go straight you have to constantly hold to the left 🤦🏼‍♀️ Very annoying and not worth $300

I bought this for my 6 year old nephew for Christmas. He hasn’t put it down since he opened it! I love that he can play it through the television or it can be used with its own screen so that he isn’t monopolizing the tv!

I’m so glad I splurged and got this for myself, came in great condition and have had no issues! I’ve been playing animal crossing non stop on it. I customized mine with stickers but the coloring is so beautiful you can keep it as is!
Takes me back to my nitendo days! I just wish it wasn't so expensive!!! Games are $50 each,  extra joycons are $60..... I'm hoping the durability makes up for the huge price tag!
Never connected with my television, has crashed and only shows error messages. basically a lemon.
This was a gift for my grandson, absolutely the only thing he wanted. He was and is delighted with his Nintendo Switch. He can play alone or with others and there are so many games to choose from.
My 10y.o daughter very likes it, she said it's like a TV game, but small and can be carried outside. Delivered on time. Thanks.

I love how good the games look on the screen.  It also sounds very good. It's easy to use and I love the touch screen. It's great to be able to take it with me so I can play my games when I'm not at home. I highly recommend this device.
came in perfect condition, no flaws what so ever, exactly as described.
Haven’t seen my son since we bought it so I think he likes it.

Quit working 6 weeks after we received it.  Thought this should last longer than this.  Of course the return window is closed so will have to figure out a different way to get our money back or exchange it

The product is pretty good, but there are some things I think Nintendo could have done better. I think Nintendo could have marketed this to an older audience, because there are some features, such as Netflix and other things of the like that are not available. My hands are also way to big for the controller, when I’m not playing it fully in handheld mode. Some parts feel cheap, such as the stand on the back. Also, the screen feels very cheap, and can scratch very easily. It’s definitely good, but could be better here and there.

Without any doubt, Nintendo Switch is the best portable gaming console. It’s modular, fairly lightweight, the joy cons are easy to play with and so many other goos features. The only disappointment for me is that it doesn’t support bluetooth heasphones!

price was jacked up but its a very good system. seller packaged the item well. only complaint is ups sucks stop using them the guy got in hids truck on my block and was bout to roll off i said "hey excuse me you dont have a package for this address? he said "ummm i have to find it. ill come back after i find it" and and rolled off down the street. i went back in the house and sat on my sofa for maybe 3 seconds and i see him at my door with my package !! i dont trust them what so ever, i believe if i didnt say anything i wouldnt have got my package

Although the title has the 1st model listed (HAC) I was sent the 2nd version (HAD) that has better battery life. For me this was fantastic, however if you wanted the 1st gen specifically for whatever reason then buyer beware.

Basterds won't let me use my credit card on the eShop even though it's legit and works just fine literally EVERYWHERE else... but aside from that, it's great. Just annoyed with Nintendo customer service... as well as my card company- Capital One

Pretty cool little machine, good graphics and unique game cartridge. Really enjoy playing g either handheld or on the tv. Pretty good games. Just missing a few of my favorites but does offer it's own unique Nintendo games

I was skeptical at first because it's been so hard to find a seller that isn't scamming people or price gouging. The price was okay and everything works so far. My wife is very happy with her birthday gift, no complaints yet.
It was used even though it said it was new and it’s model number was removed.

Great service. I couldn’t find the Nintendo switch anywhere for weeks. Decided to pay a little more and ordered it. The switch came 10 days sooner than the soonest promised date. It came new as promised and my daughter is loving it. Great seller.

My Nintendo won't connect to the tv I've tried so many times it just won't connect. The games are overpriced like Minecraft for 30$. And you can't do anything without online membership. The games lag way to much for a 300$ console and I always crash in my games especially Minecraft.
I bought a "like new" Switch from Amazon Warehouse that was missing parts and the console itself did not work. Immediately returned.
Game doesn't even come with it. Can't believe I dropped $600 because of some effed up something I can't even call a human being.

We love the system. Couldn’t find a switch  because apparently with everyone staying home because of Covid-19 they were sold out everywhere. We were happy to finally find this but disappointed that we had to pay $450 when the MSRP is $299.  Regardless, our family has had a lot of fun with this.

Huge success! Switch works great and provides entertainment for the whole family. We have used this for family game night and love it!Only issue we have had is when the switch sits in the docking station, occasionally it will not immediately connect. There does not appear to be any damage so we haven’t quite figured out the issue.

I gave this to my 17 year old son and he loved it. He wanted this version so he can play with his girlfriend at the same time she is on her switch. Becareful because the other version doesn't allow that.

Someone bought this as a gift for me and it works as expected. I’ve had it for 3 months now and haven’t encountered any problems. It connects to internet, came with all the proper parts with the new and proper packaging, and runs smoothly.With LEGOHarry potter, it will occasionally encounter and error and close the program (its a downloaded game I stead of game cartridge). Not sure if this will be consistent with future downloaded games, which is my one worry, but runs smoothly in all other aspects.

So we've had this out of the Box for 5 days. All of a sudden the AC adapter does not want to charge the system. Talk to nintendo directly and they had me reset the AC adapter. Is this going to be something that happens consistently? If so, that's stinks!

It's awesome. I love how the joycons feel in my hands while playing the games. There is a great assortment of games for the system too! I love that it is travel sized and easy to set up so I can move it from the living room to the bedroom.
This is literally an anti-anxiety machine for me when I have to travel for extended periods.I love it more than my phone, ipad, ps4, most people I know, etc.

Got this as a birthday gift to myself. Arrived sooner than expected delivery date, was surprised. All items in box and working as new. I love this console so much, brings back nostalgic memories I used to have with the original DS.

I love my switch so much!(I’m 28)  I like entertaining and having something to do other than just look at eachother is so awesome. I mostly play Mario kart all the time. But also enjoy mortal kombat when I’m playing alone. Also really cool that I can play online.

We have had a lot of fun with this system and look forward to traveling with it this Christmas and playing with family in Tennessee.  They have a switch and there are some games you can connect with two switches.
Hasta el momento me he Sentido bien con esta consola para el fin que la compre

really sweet little console. Arrived on time in pristine condition. The console is easy to set up and looks great both big and little screen. Controls take a bit to get used to especially if your used to PS or XBX.
This is part of a Christmas gift,, but I couldn't find a better deal if I had gone out looking for one on my own,,, thank you

This is a second switch for my house, we considered a Lite and debated for over a year. The system is just super wonderful and I just cannot say enough about how much we have appreciated having it these days.

I got this for my son it works great he loves it. Everything is working fine. We hooked it up to tv it’s working perfect. The only problem is he wants more games and they are not cheap lol be prepared to buy games.

Came faster than expected and was a welcomed Easter gift. Quarantine had my kids crazy and this was a treat. Couldn’t find it anywhere else, so paid more than normal- but worth it! Packaged with care. Tracked and perfect. Thank you!
Switch works great but charging station lasted a day. It will not charge the switch. I followed seversl suggested directions asked family to assist as well. Nothing works. I am pissed.
Great product!  Our son loves it for traveling
My Screen Color is ever so slightly 'warm'Excellent battery life, had it on downloading games, and playing for about 6 hours total before it got to 10% (Half brightness or less)

I was lucky enough to get this at normal price and it’s worth every penny! It makes family game night so much more enjoyable for myself, my significant other, and our six year old. The console was new and as described.
Outstanding special edition nintendo switch animal crossing. If you are a AC fan it is a must have! If you can get 2 and save one for later to sell as these are hard to find at this price!

Love that we can play it on the big screen amd then take it on the go. The game options are great for all levels of gaming especially for me as a mother who doesn't care for many games. Love that it is multiplayer. Only complaint is the joy stickes eventually wear out and need to replace the controller. Other then that its recommended to all.

It was a great buy! I got the exactly what it shows, I was so happy to know it came with all the add one for the controllers! I have used it to play Mario kart and Skyrim, it runs great when docked and multiplayer!It turned on right away. Touch screen, joy cons, sound, vibration, and everything is working perfectly!

It was getting boring around the house lately so I wanted to get a new console to play. I didn’t want to buy aftermarket prices so I managed to get one on here after waiting some time. The console is amazingly light and designed very well. The gf and I were up all night playing smash bro’s and loved the convenience that the console comes with two controllers so we did not have to buy another one. Looking forward to trying out the other games on the switch!
Super fun as all Nintendo consoles/games

My grandson loves the game but one of the buttons on the joystick fell off after 3 weeks... I am sending it back and they are sending a new one,  so hopefully the new one will be good... concerned about the quality... it was $300, I certainly hope the replacement will be good!
Period.
Anyone who owns one of these has some of the fastest hands in this world
It was great as a system. But I got the older version and it was still way to pricey. But I guess I get what I deserve for taking a gamble at these scams.
