Great Seller!!! Received product well in advance of delivery date which was a nice surprise. All contents accounted for and was easy to hook up and get started. I understand the price inflation due to it being such a hot item. Thank you!!

Love that it is the newest software version. The local stores had Nintendo Switches at a cheaper price or bundled but they were all the older software version. So glad I bought it throigh Amazon and have the most current product as many store associates were not knowledgeable. Highly recommend as autistic son loves it.
I have been using this console for 6 months. I have good time with my roommates playing "Animal Crossing". It's a good activity to do at home especially you cannot go anywhere during the pandemic
I'm glad I bought this before the whole pandemic.As for my thoughts on this device, I'm a casual gamer and this suits me perfectly. Great to carry around with you during travels of any sort.

Gift for my daughter! She absolutely loved it!

Got it on time to save the day.  GameStop had dropped the ball in shipping and could not find my order after weeks.  Amazon was a tad higher price but made the child very happy.

We've had the Nintendo switch for a couple of months and it's been well worth the money.  It's portable and can be used as a console at the TV.  For me, this was a great 2 in 1 deal.  It's pricey, but worth it.

Was very lucky to get this at the MSRP through pre-order.  Actually arrived more than a month earlier than shipping date at time of purchase.  My first switch and very easy to set up and begin using.  Mainly got it to play ACNH and I am having a great time on my island.  ;-)  Looking forward to getting some accessories to enhance my experience with this device.  As you can see in the pic, I have it guarded by the Winchesters and a rogue angel.  LOL
My 10 year old son LOVES this gamer! He also really loves that he can still play with his friends on Fortnite no matter what system they are playing from. Great little system.
Thankful to be able to snag one so we can stop arguing about who gets a turn playing it next in the house. When you have 4 people who all want to play and are all stuck at home...it's a nightmare.
The Switch shipped quickly and came with everything is should have. We have really enjoyed it and had no problems at all (and it's had a lot of use in the last 2 months). Works great!

Awesome console for the whole family to enjoy! A ton of great games to choose from, and I find myself conflicted at times because I want to play all of them at once! I love how it can be played anywhere on the go as a handheld, then easily be transferred to TV gameplay. I strongly recommend buying this console, you won't regret it!

Omg yea so much regret.... of not buying it earlier!!!! This console is so fun I am always playing Zelda on the go, at home or playing ring fit adventure. I can’t imagine without it in my life now. If you’re on the fence about getting a switch because you have other consoles and a gaming pc like me, just me you need this in your life

Love it. I’m a mom of two young teens and I have never been a big player but this game is so much fun for the whole family. Love the fact it’s portable and you can connect it to your tv. Multiple players are a big plus

It’s amazing, and the colors are just beautiful.  Thank you Amazon for doing a restock on release date. Don’t waste your money on scalpers, if Amazon themselves do a restock go with them for an HONEST price.
The best buy ever..!!
We like it a lot.  Nintendo's not breaking any new ground here.  The screen is nicer on these new units than my launch version so there's that.
So nice we bought it twice

I love the switch. And buyong one for my sister made me love it even more as a game console because its so versitile and convenient for travel!! I live it so much. The only downside is that for most games, and for the console itself, you need lots of accessories like a case, or grips for the joycons for comfortability. I also wish that the games were a bit cheaper due to the fact that they are sooo small and they don't hold memeory. Other than that. I'd recommend this product to anyone.
I'm so happy I finally got one of these, I slapped a samsung microsd in there and my games are lightning fast. It's the correct model number too, not the old one.
Love this product, came with everything I needed and worth every penny for it, I play all the time. It's in great condition and they did a great job on packaging so that it would not get damaged.
The new processor with it's better battery life and cooler running is very nice.

Got it for my son .... he loves it of course he turned 11 and loves video games like all boys ... enjoys the portable switch as he can take it with him any where he goes .specially .. in the car . It’s a lovely gift

The Nintendo Switch is great at well, switching, no matter if it's on the bus or in the living room, the Nintendo Switch is a great console for the family or the dedicated gamer. This version, the V2, is a big upgrade over the original Switch and has a very noticeable extended battery life compared to the original Switch, with newer joycons included and a brighter LCD screen. Love it, use it everyday!

Great product. It’s only fair they really increased the price after stores were sold out. It came new in the box and Was a gift to a post hospital patient. They worked with me to get the product shipped as soon as possible and I really appreciate it.

I've owned the original switch and the updated one. As someone who does a lot of traveling the improved battery life is definitely noticeable in this updated version. I haven't had to pull out my battery pack on a flight. This upgraded version has an improved CPU and memory for the same price as the original switch.
I bought it to play party games with my friends and family.We really enjoy it and thanks Nintendo for always bring such sort of consoles to the world especially under the covid pandemic.

The pictures don't do this Switch justice. The colors are pastel but they have a real nice shine to them in person. It's so pretty I don't even want to use it! I think this is the nicest Switch they have released so far.
Arrived almost immediately...haven't tried it as it's a Christmas gift, but KNOW (because it's from Prime!) it will make our son/wife EXTREMELY HAPPY CAMPERS!  Thank you!
We’ve had the whole line of Nintendo consoles, and have been very happy with the switch. We love the huge variety of games and the ease of use. Would definitely recommend
The console is beautiful but don't overpay for it.
This is a gift so I don't know much about the item itself but I got it at a great price. I'm sure they will be happy when they get it for Christmas. Very quick shipping.

This was the first Switch I ever used. I ended up giving it to my nephew and purchasing a red/blue joycon. Overall the color was unique and different but I eventually caved and got the standard instead.

My son received this as a gift. He says it works great the only thing that takes some time is when you have to download games. Easy to hold and great picture quality.  Also nice to be able to play on the TV as well.
I bought this as a gift for the gamer in the family.  He is very happy with the Nintendo Switch and the game I bought separately.  It was delivered earlier than expected.

The switch works perfect but the box was not sealed when I received it. One of my joy con controllers is missing the R and L detachable piece to the controller. I reached out to them they said they would get back to me and never did very disappointed as I cannot find this piece for sale on its own....
Not easy to find instructions, if you are new to a switch. YouTube is the best resource, since navigating Nintendo‘a website isn’t easy or straightforward either. It is, however a good product.

This is very disappointing.  I live in the caribbean and I just got my switch and with all the excitement in the world I tried to access the eshop. Turns out it is not available in my country.  I'm not able to download any games at all.  Now I'm thinking of selling it to buy a PlayStation vita instead. At least I know I can get downloads for sure.  I'm so disappointed in Nintendo.
My husband never takes time to enjoy his hobbies. I bought this to let him escape. This has been a blast for him and my 4 year old as he teaches her his childhood games.

This was bought as a gift. It arrived almost a week earlier than scheduled, new, in the box. My daughter is extremely happy with it. While it was priced higher than I was expecting, this was the only seller that had new ones in stock.
Does what it is supposed to do. Was easy to set up for someone with limited video game experience.

Despite the price I couldn't help myself, it's just too cute. The product was perfect, came in the original packaging unopened. I didn't realize the game wasn't included until it was too late (you'd think for that price they throw in the actual game). It also came a little later than I expected but still in the time frame it gave me. Overall it's a great product but an outrageous price.

The system is great, and I love many of the games on the switch. However, I’m not impressed when I take over a year to save up the money, and I find the product already has scratches, and the red joycon spontaneously disconnects and needs to be reset multiple times in each gameplay session. The console is great, but perhaps consider purchasing from somewhere other than amazon.
My kids love the colors
Came in pristine condition. My two boys love this thing...so much so I had to buy a second one because they seem to want to play with it at the same time.
Geez, I suck at these games. Now in my 50's I'm trying to work on my reaction time and reflexes and these games on the switch show me how much I suck :)

While technologically inferior to the other 2 consoles of this gen, the Switch is hands down the most fun of them all. There are just a gazillion games available and the ability to seamlessly switch from docked mode to portable mode is just priceless. Nothing can beat being able to play your favorite games anywhere you want. Definitely a must buy.

The switch works great, and I actually use a mini docking station, so it fits it perfectly. The joy cons that came with it are not working properly, so that has been a struggle. The right z functions stick when you hold them down and won't come back up for a bit. But I work all day. I don't have time to sit on hold and complain.

i'm very pleased and happy to have gotten my hands on this console, it's really cute and the details on the back of the console and on the dock make this long time animal crossing fan EXTREMELY happy! the build quality is not much different than a regular switch- and this is one of the models with the better battery life as well, so thats a plus! once it's back in stock for a regular price, i recommend it for any animal crossing fan! though its very unfortunate scalpers have snatched up most systems and are selling it for almost double the price :(
Purchased this to replace my og Switch. Purchased this for the unique style and love the pastel colors.
My younger brother enjoyed it. I haven’t much played it myself. But I do like that I can finally play Fire Emblem once again... literally the only reason why I got the console.

My 8 year old son loves this system. He’s never really been into video games, but it’s easier for him than the PS4 and other newer systems. It’s nice that he can play on the tv or just hold it in his hands. We’ve only owned it for a week, but so far it’s great.
We all love this ...my daughter can take it on the road to play but we can also hook it up to the TV so we can all play....great gift definitely worth the price
My daughter can not get enough of this, I miss her.  OMG - FortNite is a blast though!!  Also bought an extra SD card, and a new controller to complement the system.

This product, while priced above MSRP, it was well below the price gouging going on by other sellers. The product arrived in a timely manner and was as described. I was a little skeptical at first due to the reviews, but i went ahead and bought it. Brand new never used Nintendo switch work find been playing it for about 5 hours now.

Bought this for my son for Christmas.  He is one happy kid.  Kids had a lot of fun playing Smash Bros, Mario Party, Mario Cart, etc.  Love that he can travel and keep himself entertained with long road trip as well.
We had no problems with this game system. It works great and we love to play it at parties. Unfortunately due to COVID, we haven't played it much lately, but when we do, we always love to have it.

best switch yet 🤧

i had the older model and now that i switched to this one (no pun intended) i wouldn’t go back, back then i had to charge my old switch like 5 times a day under heavy gaming sessions, now i have to worry maybe once! great upgrade and heavily recommended if you mostly play 2d and indie games
We love that we can control the amount of time spent on the device from our smart phone & that there are a variety of games that are family friendly.

I have always wanted a Nintendo unit and now I have one. This one is in all black as I wasn’t too crazy about the other colors. Works great and they have a wide variety of games to choose from and can connect to your tv or go mobile with it.

Usually, I am not one to make a big purchase like this since I am paranoid something will happen to it during delivery but the price was right so I went ahead and bought it. Got this for my sister and she loves it. My cousin also wanted one but it was sold out and now marked up ridiculously high. Would buy again at MSRP if I could. Pretty colors!
Hahaha it's cute and worthful

Fun hybrid console. It's portable but can play on the tv too. I love it. The main downside is that the menu gets messy if you have many downloaded games. No way to organize game tiles

One of the best purchases I made before they became sold out. Super great quality of gaming, great sound, the vibrations are awesome and all the versatilities are unbeatable! One of the best Nintendo systems I’ve had!

It's as you would expect another lovely console by Nintendo. It's great for family and friend gatherings but is also fun for solo play. Perfect Christmas present for our 10 year old. Love the coordinating parent app to control settings with. Ten yr old is obsessed with this thing (previous PS4 user). Would totally recommend!

Best purchase I have ever made great quality good games better than ps4 and Xbox

Bought this for Christmas present for my adult children. Fantastic fun for the whole family. There are so many entertaining games. Highly recommend!
Works great, brand new from factory. Kids, wife, and myself all love it. This is the perfect platform to get the family together no matter your gaming experience.

I bought this for my son and it didn’t even last 6 months! This is way too much money! He barely even plays it.

Let me start by saying that I am so glad I got this switch. I didn’t buy it from a scalper or even from Amazon— on launch day, Target had a few units available and pure determination had me up at 1am to order for pick-up in store and in Time Square at store opening to ensure I got my unit.Unfortunately, as is true with many Nintendo special/limited editions, a bunch of absolutely horrible, awful people have bought out these units with the intention of selling them at an inflated rate to make a profit. And sadly they succeed in their slimy business venture because of the high desirability of these items. Let me give you two reasons why you should definitely not purchase it, even as a massive Animal Crossing fan.

I’m so disappointed to just be learning that Nintendo has one of the WORST ecosystems around, I wanted to love them. We got our lite first then a week later a regular switch. I purchased a few (overpriced!) games with the lite, with my account and soon learned my daughter or wife can’t play them in their accounts. Then my wife and I started playing Animal Crossing, I setup my island first and later she did but she remarked how her island had the same name as mine. Turns out Nintendo intentionally limits you to the same island per switch console!  WTF kind of money grab is that bulls$&*t Then I purchased 3 months of online gaming on my account on my Switch and started playing the streaming SNES games. My daughter started playing on her lite under my account so she could play Paw Patrol that I had purchased on my account on the lite. It kicked me offline immediately since you can’t have two online at the same time in the same account. So if you have multiple family members, they all need accounts and need to purchase their games all separate on their own accounts. I have never, ever, before seen other gaming systems with such intentional money grab schemes in my life. I tried adding the other accounts together as a family account but Nintendo verifies this by charging the main accounts card! You can just send an email to verify but instead need to charge their card! I’d advise staying away from such a ridiculous product.

The Switch Lite may fall short in many areas, but this is the one to get. Its an improved original switch, with better battery life. However about 2 hours of battery life is the only difference, so if you find the old switch at a discount price that may be worth getting as well. This one has all the features and you can be sure all games will work with it, unlike the Switch Lite. The Switch Lite isn't worth getting IMO.The biggest pro IMO of the switch is the detachable joy-con's. I have never seen a handheld with detachable joy-con's before this one, and its a huge improvement. If you get sticky buttons, worn out buttons or have a problem with your joy-con's you can just swap them with a new set instead of having to replace the whole handheld. Because of Joy-con drift Nintendo is now fixing Joy-Con's for free so you can buy 2 sets of joy-con's and send one out while the other set is getting fixed. I play Pokemon and a lot of it which requires mashing the A button a lot so I used to find that the A button got worn down much faster than other buttons on previous systems. It was a very complicated procedure to fix this problem on previous handhelds, they didn't come apart too easily if you could get them apart at all. If you tinker or like taking things apart its much easier to take apart a single joy-con and replace a button pad rather than it is to take apart most of a handheld to reach the part that needs to be replaced. This increases the longevity of the system and makes it more durable without having to spend a lot of money on future systems.

Switch’s big sell is its versatility. As I’ve already stated, it’s both a handheld and a home console. Its innards are powerful enough to deliver better-than-Wii U visuals, no matter where you happen to be. If you want to play The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild on the bus, you can. If you’d rather sit in front of your TV and sink your teeth into some competitive online Splatoon 2, you can do that too. Heck, if you fancy a two-player game of Mario Kart 8 Deluxe while sat in the park, I would be 100% behind that decision.Pro: It’s extremely flexible. The main selling point of Switch is its ability to transform from a home console to a portable gaming system in a snap. And on that front, it works as well as advertised. Transitioning from one style of gaming to another takes seconds and lets you continue playing right where you left off. A likely use-case is people who want to keep playing when their spouse/parent/roommate wants to watch something on the TV

I’ve had my Nintendo Switch for about a year and half and I can definitely say I have not regretted that purchase since. Although I have the original version that has the shorter battery life, this shouldn’t take away from the review. I still have managed to seek hundreds of hours into all my games. As of right now I have 5 games which includes Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild, Super Mario Odyssey, Pokemon Sword, and Fire Emblem Three Houses. These are all great games to choose but I recommend Super Mario Odyssey as your first game of choice as it is super enjoyable for just about everyone. The Switch feels great in both handheld and TV mode. To summarize, the Nintendo Switch is an amazing product for not only hardcore Nintendo Fans but also for average person or family.But to get to why you should consider getting a Nintendo Switch, the first and most marketed reason is that you can both play it on your TV and on the go. When the Nintendo Switch goes to handheld mode, it experiences very little noticeable graphic drops. Being able to play your favorite games whenever you want is an amazing experience, especially with such high graphics compared to other handheld consoles. The second reason is that a lot of games with multiplayer, both first and third party, allow the Switches new joy-con controllers to be split into two controllers so two people can play at the same time without buying another controller. Some of the big games that are compatible with this are Super Smash Bros and Mario Kart, which are the Switches top 10 highest selling games. As for the third and final reason is that all first party games and most third-party games offer a great game play and an overall great experience to a game. The Switch even comes with a grip to hold both of them together and wrist strips for when they are separate. A small point to add is that the rest of Switch items, the two chords and dock are really easy to set-up and take anywhere. It’s made easier to carry them with the overabundance of Switch accessories everywhere.

The Nintendo Switch is a by for that most convenient and versatile console on the market. And If you're reading this during the epidemic you may have to wait a little while to get one sadly.Let's make this simple:

However, for a child to use it, you MUST make your own Nintendo account as well as a child account, download the app to set some parental controls, then use their website to set another round of parental controls. Really poorly designed and not intuitive. For example, when making an account, it allows you to use Google, Facebook etc instead of setting a unique Nintendo password. Convenient! However, you can’t buy anything without a parental password, so once you get father along and try to download something, they forgot about the Google sign in and you need to go back to the beginning and set up new Nintendo password for the parent. I would return this hunk of junk if it would make my kid have a tantrum.

Over all really great. It came in nicely and on time, no issues at first.  It is now day 3, and my right controller drifts or won’t calibrate. I would say it has nothing to do with the seller, but Nintendo Switches are just so over priced due to the limited supply, and to discover my right joy stick doesn’t work properly was disappointing.Sure I can just buy new controllers, and I’m thankful that it is an option, however if your considering purchasing, and buying this product can possibly put a little dent in your pocket, then your gonna wanna pass with this company. Faulty joy stick, no warranty Included to call in Nintendo to fix, it would be gamble, and I wouldn’t suggest it’s worth it.

I grew up playing Super NES, Nintendo 64, and Gameboy. The Switch is essentially all three of those systems wrapped into one. While traveling, I use the Switch exclusively in handheld mode. However, when I'm at home, this system gives me the option of playing on the TV as well.It comes with everything you need to start playing (except for a game). I've got a couple of games for it and also downloaded free games. I haven't purchased a SD card and haven't had any issues with space. I haven't upgraded the joy cons or purchased a pro controller. My wife and I play Mario on this a few times a week with the joy cons and they work just fine. Obviously, upgrading to better controllers would be more comfortable but it isn't impossible to play without the pro controller.

When your not using it in handheld mode, buy and extra controller to use so you don't wear out the originals.  I've bought both an extra set to slide in to send in to get fixed and Bluetooth controllers and the handheld has held up far better than both sets of dongles.  Warning, there's some shady marketing going on with the SanDisk SD Cards, while it appears it's bundled with this, it's not!  They will come separately so save yourself some money, SanDisk makes an awesome 400 gb card for the same price as the 256 GB yellow one.

You don't need a long review for this one. I have a dedicated gaming PC, the newest iterations of Xbox and PS, and Switch. The amount of time spent with the Switch dwarfs the others, with the gaming PC coming in a distant second. I see no need to purchase Xbox / PS consoles moving forward as they are fully redundant / less robust in comparison to the gaming PC. The Switch, with its portability, occupies a different niche. But more importantly, the standout games it does have are what makes the difference. I put more hours into Fire Emblem: Three Houses in 1 month than I have played my PS in its lifetime. Breath of the Wild was a spectacular introduction to the system.This is the console to own if you are going to have a console.

My Son has just turned 5 and I am very comfortable knowing that most his gaming is on this console, Nintendo really takes care of the small details, I'm still impressed how they thought of adding that horrible taste to the game cartridges/cards so that kids wouldn't swallow them! also the parental control features through your smart phone is pretty neat and very easy to use, whitelisting games and allowing more time to play could be easier.If you are not sure what to get your children as a gaming console I am pretty sure you wouldn't find a better alternatives, over 20 years ago we had various Nintendo consoles and Mario titles were one of the best parts of our childhood Entertainment, I'm glad our children can enjoy the same experience with the latest enhancements obviously. If you have Spectrum internet (and maybe others), then you cannot connect this console to the Internet.Its poorly-designed firmware says that the network requires registration (this would apply to most public WiFi networks such as what you’d find at Starbucks, where you need to accept some ToS before it will allow you to connect, but certainly doesn’t apply to my home internet connection, which works great for ANY device except the Nintendo Switch). From there, it directs you to login to the router admin (which there is no actual need to do). Once you have logged in, there is nothing to do except exit. After you exit, you will not be connected to the Internet.

I have been having issues where the wrist strap modules won't stay connected to the joy-con and slide off or they get stuck and have to be forced off.  Each of my modules behaves in one of those two ways, although the one that slides off may be because the other needs to be forced off.  Went though customer support and still having issue with "fixed" modules.  Can't find a way to contact support directly, only automated contact through web site.  Joy-cons also seem to randomly disconnect and reconnect while playing causing loss of control in game.  Poorly designed and frustrating system.

Once you link a console profile to a Nintendo account, it cannot be unlinked without deleting the profile.  This means that your child can link his or her profile to a parental account and bypass parental controls.  As there is no way to transfer game information or purchases between profiles, I'm face with a deciding between letting my 10-year old have full parental access and purchase abilities through my account or deleting his profile, causing him to lose all of his purchases and game information.This is a serious flaw in both the parental controls and the product design.  Nintendo's stance is that there is a warning about this on the console.  That doesn't help when a child is the one responding.  I should have bought an X-Box instead.

This is an excellent Device

I like this one a lot better than the switch lite. It's bigger, and the screen is much more colorful, and brighter. It also doesn't hurt my hands like the switch lite did after playing for a while. I think because the controls are a little bigger. The battery lasts a long time. I had to charge my switch lite 2-3 times to get the same play time out of it as this system.I play Mario Kart online for 2+ hours and still had 30% battery left. The next day I was able to get another 1.5 hours of Mario Kart off that last 30%. I ended up charging it at 16% because I didn't want to run the battery all the way down.

We have 6 kids who played on and loved the Xbox, only thing is I wanted more kid type games for them so we ended up buying a switch and then Immediately a second one for our other room because we loved it so much. Every day since they have rushed to get school done, so they can play on it. We homeschool. We love all the games, only thing we wished they had was Roblox for the switch as they love those games as well. Do wish they had a bigger selection of games and each game is pretty expensive but you can sometimes find better deals online on Nintendo’s website. Make sure if you want digital to get a bigger memory card. Maybe one day they will have Roblox available. We also loved that it is super easy to travel with so we bought a case to protect them and took them to grandma’s as she has nothing for the littler kids to do. What was even cooler is that you can set it up on its stand and play multiple player even without a TV screen which is amazing!!! So many cool things about it as you don’t need internet to play either, it can be played solo or with others. Also love the dance 2020 game as the whole family gets up and dances together. The parental control blocks are also a bonus!!! Not to mention Xbox family is double the cost so a year of family on the switch is very affordable at about half cost. The size is also very compact and small. I’ll share a pic as size comparison. Oh and we bought a screen protector as well as I was worried sliding it in and out of the console might scratch it. Hope this helps! Oh and the pic is of the same switch but different color joycons. The gray one is in the other room but I wanted to show you the compact size. So look for the blue and red gaming console next to clock. For size comparison our TV is a 65”.

Great casual gaming. I suggest hunting down the physical disks over utilizing the Nintendo store if she'd like to maximize your dollar value in a long run. If you have large hands I'd also suggest getting a remote control that fits your hands. I like that the switch has so many options available of controllers. all of the players in my house have been able to find forms that are comfortable for them. As a huge Mario fan there's no other place for me to get these titles. the biggest hit on the system is that many of the streaming services do not have applications or programs available at this time which is just strange to me.

Bought for my son’s birthday! Great video game console. It is very small and light which makes it very portable. The screen isn't too small, but just right to be able to use it without problem. The resolution of the screen itself is a little low, 720p, but when it is connected to a TV or monitor it outputs at 1080p. The system is rugged and well built and we have no problems with it when it comes to its hardware. It is very comfortable in the hand and we have no problem playing with it for a long periods of time. The battery is also great. It lasts him hours of playtime without problem and is great for commutes.

The nintendo switch in my opinion is one of the best portable consoles in the world. Its very light, very powerful, and is really portable. The nintendo switch gives you possibilities to play wherever you want and whenever you want. Which is something you can't do with an Xbox one or a PS4. The game selection is constantly expanding with many games some of my favorite being Minecraft and Super Mario Bros Ultimate. I myself am a mario fan and this console lets me play whatever mario game I want in its amazing 720p or 1080p docked screen. The joycons feel awesome in the hand and truly are unique. Overall the nintendo switch is an amazing console by nintendo and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a portable gaming console.

Sim, o Switch atendeu bem às expectativas. O engraçado é que já não vejo mais ele como um console portátil, ou apenas dessa forma e sim como um console em miniatura pois é possível jogar com a mobilidade de um portátil e o conforto de um joystick padrão.Pontos negativos: a conexão do switch com o Wifi é péssima e não foi nessa versão revisada que melhoraram, infelizmente. Outra que o aparelho não contém lacres na caixa e plásticos que contém seus componentes, o que o deixa com cara de usado.

I bought a switch when they first came out, completed Zelda Breath of the Wild and eventually Super Mario Odyssey, then never picked it up again... sold it and missed it forever due to the fact that Nintendo decided to grace us with an impressive game library to date, what ultimately sells me on the switch now, is its portability, and to take all the wonderful games not just the Nintendo name has to offer but other big name titles as well, I would like however to see more apps within the store, along with classic titles that were available on Wii&WiiU store overall you can never go wrong in *investing* in a Nintendo product.

Entrega super rápida e console conforme informado. Super recomendo! O Nintendo Switch é maravilhoso. Received the console, but there is a defect or dead pixel on the screen. I tried to do an exchange for the same item, but the Amazon representative stated that I could only return it and try to reorder the console. That won’t happen, because it is limited edition. Such a hassle and waste of time. Now I can’t play Animal Crossing tomorrow because of the inability to transfer saves.Well, someone had to get the lemon. Funny thing is that my last Switch had a small defect too, but not the screen. I am starting to question Nintendo’s Quality Assurance.

Recibí los dos kilogramos de harina de trigo más costosos de mi vida. The Nintendo Switch is the best!! It's portable, light weight, and perfect for gaming on the go. The unboxing and setup experience was easy and straight forward. It has lots of fun games and Nintendo exclusives making it a great gaming system. The battery lasts long and the product itself feels very high quality too. I use my Switch mostly in handheld mode but playing in TV mode is just so much better because of the 1080p output and bigger screen. The joy-cons feel very nice in the hand and the HD rumble makes the games feel so much more immersive. The dock is also not as big as I thought it would be and it doesn't take up much space either. There is even a HDMI cable included so even if you don't have a spare one, you don't have to worry because it's already included in the box.Also another thing to note, the Switch does not have a built in microphone, so in order to voice chat with your friends in online games like Fortnite, you have to connect a pair of headphones that have a mic, use a gaming headset, or use the Nintendo Switch Online app on your phone or tablet. Some games also require the Nintendo Switch Online Subscription in order to play online but its very cheap and affordable at only $4.99/month or $24.99/annually. I am glad that Nintendo has chosen to keep the online subscription prices so low!

Llegó rápido y en buenas condiciones. Versión con batería mejorada.Tenía la duda de comprarla debido a que es importada, pero revisé que Nintendo de igual manera ofrece la garantía de 1 año, solo que hay que enviarla a E.U.; aún así, la probabilidad de que tenga un defecto de fábrica es muy baja. Por lo que no le veo desventaja contra la versión nacional, y la diferencia en precios es notoria.

Gran consola, que aunque carece de potencia como xbox o playstation, es una opcion buenísima para jugar, y el hecho de ser hibrida entre portatil y sobremesa le da muchisimo valor. Los materiales de la consola se sienten de buena calidad, excepto los joycons, que no es que sean malos, pero se siente muy delicados, eso si, no me han dado ningún tipo de problema, asi que quizas solo sea la sensacion de fragilidad. La pantalla cumple muy bien, aun que ahi ya depende tambien de los juegos, agunos se ven mejor que otros en modo portatil. Es recomendable comprar una mica de cristal, ya que aun que es el nuevo modelo no parece que hayan arreglado del todo el problema de la fricción con el dock, y con una cuantas veces que lo he metido se a rayado (Aun que no fueron marcas permanentes, quizás con el tiempo si sean permanentes). La bateria dura bastante, no podria decir la diferencia con el modelo anterior por que no lo tengo, pero por lo general me dura entre 6-9 horas usandolo con diferentes juegos.

El Joycon venía en malas condiciones, hacía ruido al usar el Joystick (Más el derecho que el izquierdo) y la pantalla de la Switch tenía pixeles muertos, lo devolví para solicitar otro igual y ahora el precio es de 8,300$, muy graciosos para acabarla

Got this console for my girlfriend who has been super stoked on this release. It was purchased with "Animal Crossing: New Horizons" and, in game, you actually receive a mini switch new horizons edition console for your island. It's cute, and coincidentally, blue and green are my facourite colours. Excellent purchase, I would buy two if I could. In terms of quality, the screen is working fine, the connectivity is perfect, we've HDMI'd it to a screen as well which worked great. No complaints, it's a working switch!

Used two stock alert sites to email me. You have to be quick it usually sells out within 1-4 min. I got lucky with the stock lasting a little over a half hour.Was sketched at first with how bright the controllers were compared to the box art. However everything works as it should. I was able to create a new account and buy things in the eshop.

I setup email alerts on nowinstock (google it). Was finally able to get a new Switch!!! I had the Switch Lite but didn’t enjoy the handheld only mode. I am a long time PC gamer and not really big on consoles but Zelda BOTW and Mario Odyssey, Super Mario Maker 2, and Animal Crossing are such fantastic games. Literally this console is worth buying even for 1 of those game’s I listed. My last Nintendo product was a GameCube I received as a child Christmas gift and this is the best purchase I made in years. No regrets at all. The neon colors are awesome too . I wasn’t sure about gaming with separate Joycons but it’s very comfortable. I ended up buying a refurbished pro controller to go with the console and it’s a good buy too if you’re coming from Xbox or ps4. I found the joycon grip to be too small for my hands
Jogabilidade excelente, mas o console veio cheio de problemas. Além do joycon drift, o console está ENVERGANDO com o tempo. Cada vez pior de colocá-lo na dock. Muito caro para ter esses problemas.

If you have long commute, travel often or just like playing your games lying down rather than in front of your TV (because you're old like me and your back hurts) - this little guy will change your life for the better.Phone is still easier to whip out and start playing/procrastinating but quality of the experience is not comparable. You just can't beat physical controls, dedicated battery and a great library of games.
Me llegó otro producto

Honestly this is such a gorgeous switch and I’m so glad that I was able to preorder it. The box it came in was a little scuffed up, but the actual switch box itself was very nicely padded and protected. The colours are even prettier in person, especially on the switch dock. Definitely would recommend that you get this switch if you’re able to, just know that the reason it’s the same price as the regular switch is because it does not come with the game.

Si bien su precio base en cuestionable, comprar una en oferta es probablemente una de las mejores inversiones que se pueden hacer hoy en día, verdaderamente cumple con su propósito de entretener, con una librería de juegos amplia y variada, además de que el concepto híbrido funciona de maravilla, solía pensar que si la compraba, usaría solamente el modo dock o el modo portatil, pero diariamente me encuentro usando ambos, es un cambio tan natural y ágil, que uno ni siquiera lo nota.Excelente consola, probablemente incluso la mejor de su generación.

I had the Nintendo Switch since launch.  Like everyone else, I absolutely love the system, however, I've always found the battery very lackluster.  With most graphic-heavy games like Breath of the Wild, Dragon Quest XI, or Astral Chain, my battery would be almost completely drained in about three hours.This is the newer, more recent version of the Switch with the supposed extended battery life.  I figured it was time for an upgrade and I made the purchase.  In all honesty, the battery is much improved over my launch model.  My three or so hours of battery life have now gone to about five hours or so with the same types of games.  That alone made the purchased worth it, at least for me, being a handheld only Switch user.
This is the new version !

Received package today, which is faster than I expected. The console is in good condition. But the problem is the charger is EUR type, which I need to use an adapter to charge my console. Is it a common thing? This is quite troublesome.

My boyfriend and I decided to purchase a switch together for Christmas. It is so much fun, and definitely worth the cost. It is easy to convert from the handheld to tv with controllers. The controllers are easy to use, and it is easy to learn how to control the system.
Entrega en tiempo y forma, en buen estado el producto, vino un poco rota la caja por dentro donde van los joycon, pero no afecta en nada a la consola
La caja de la consola venía con un golpe, debido a no encontrarse debidamente protegida.No venia con plastico burbuja ni bolsas de aire para protegerle

Bought this game for my daughters since they wanted to play animal crossing. Got it at a good price of sgd499 before it suddenly increased to sgd649 within a few days..Subahanallah, a good sgd150 diff! Could buy me 2 to 3 games! Probably increased due to a spike in popularity. Wanted to buy the Animal Crossing Limited Edition console but that was way above budget at sgd700+ or so..Some places are selling for almost sgd900..madness! Anyway the console is the Asian region and it is really good. Just make sure you don't get addicted.
My  Nintendo came in 3 days everything new  I am so happy  it all came raped up in box  I give them 10

Me gusto mucho el tema que viene detrás de estas consolas que siempre se han utilizado como portátiles como los Nintendo 3DS , 2DS y poder jugar los juegos clasicos como son todos los Mario y Zelda, lo que mas me gusta de esta versión es que puedes pasar la imagen a la TV (conecta y juega), los gráficos nunca serán como un ps4 o xbox one sin embargo los juegos mencionados son muy entretenidos y familiares. Esta versión 1.1 viene con un poco de mejora en la calidad de los colores en su pantalla y un incremento de duración en la batería portatil. El producto llego en tiempo y bien protegido.

La verdad es un robo el precio, pero es un "must" que debes tener si tienes niños, pagas la tecnología (me imagino) pero bien pudiera valer la mitad y sería un precio alto y justo. Además los controles son súper pequeños, tal vez para los niños pequeños está bien pero para un adolescente o adulto es súper incómodo.
I say just wait till Nintendo releases more switches don’t buy third party. I sadly did, that didn’t turn out well, but I got to back order mine from amazon and it’s coming today.

Não tem como reclamar do Switch. Ele atendeu perfeitamente minhas expectativas, posso levar para qualquer lugar; com a bateria carregada posso jogar Zelda: Breath of the Wild por 5 horas tranquilamente. E talvez, pra mim, o que mais me impressiona é a facilidade de você poder tirar do deck e colocar de novo e continuar a jogar normalmente, quase que instantaneamente. Ponto também pro modo descanso do console, eu praticamente eu quase não desligo o console e quando eu preciso a voltar a jogar é só entrar no jogo que parei e pronto. E sem contar os jogos excelentes da Nintendo, que tem um nível criativo absurdo. O console mais divertido ever.

I always wanted to get the Switch but waited till either Animal Crossing or Metroid comes out on Switch. So here it was, I played primarily on my PS4 and I still do but the Switch is such an awesome addition. I really love playing games in handheld the most and is something I didn't think I'd appreciate a lot.The battery life is pretty good lasting me about 5-6 hours with max brightness in handheld mode using a headset plugged in sometimes. I know there are people who has joycon drift, which is when the joycon stick has problems and it turns by itself causing the camera or character to move. So far I haven't had that yet, it could be since these are the new Switch version they might've done a bit of tweaking but not sure on that.

Chegou super rápido, no dia seguinte da postagem! Embalagem veio até com adesivo de frágil para evitar qualquer problema no envio. O console é muito bom, e ainda pode virar um jogo portátil, espetacular. Veio com todos os acessórios e a facilidade de comprar jogos on-line e só precisar fazer o download no console não tem preço.

Bought the switch when I saw the sweet deal at $499! Highly recommend to those looking for the cheapest switch on the market so far. Shipping is extremely fast (especially with priority shipping) I bought the console because I wanted to play animal crossing and smash with my boyfriend. Have yet to try multi-player mode, but the controllers work well and connects to my monitor with ease! I've been using it for almost a week and have not run into any problems (touch wood) definitely recommend since Amazon is a legit place to buy instead of places like carousel where you can get scammed. (Bad experience)

Excelente el servicio de Amazon, tuve un fallo con el primero e inmediatamente me lo cambiaron, el nintendo switch sencillamente es la mejor consola de la generación, vale cada centavo con o sin descuento, tengo 3 Nintendo Switch y el único problema que noto con esta revisión, es que sinceramente no se nota para nada la diferencia en la duración de la batería en modo portátil, lo siento muy similar, incluso igual, diría yo, pero es mi punto de vista, quizá porque el tiempo pasa volando mientras juegas, pero es muy difícil notar una diferencia

This is the first switch that I have ever owned.  I had put off buying one for the longest time and when Animal Crossing was getting closer to being released, I realized that I had to stop waiting and purchase a switch.  I than procrastinated even longer and Nintendo dropped this special edition.  So in the end I learned that if I wait, good things will come my way.  The colors are beautiful, system works wonderfully and I am extremely pleased with this purchase.  It's so damn cute and looks adorable next to my TV.

4.5 Stars - From a fun console to one of the hottest commodities especially during the pandemic, Nintendo probably hit the jackpot on the versatility of this item. While it's designed for being portable though, I'm not a fan of playing this as a hand-held device especially when you have smaller hands, but the Joycon Grip remedies the issue.OVERALL IMPRESSION

O produto estava ofertado por um valor bem mais baixo do que o dos concorrentes e mesmo assim chegou certinho e em perfeitas condições.A loja demora bastante pra enviar (eu não disse entregar), mas não posso considerar isso um ponto negativo, pois eles colocam um prazo de entrega longo e cumprem esse prazo.

No existen muchas diferencias entre la versión original, y la 1.1 de la Nintendo Switch.Las únicas que he notado hasta ahora han sido el acabado mate en la parte posterior, y la batería, que dura alrededor de 2 horas más en comparación con la versión original.

Lo compré diciendo el provedor que era nuevo y cuando llego la caja estaba muy ligeramente maltratada, pero hasta sellada venía... el problema es que al encender la consola ya hasta tenía un usuario registrado con juegos y todo, la verdad esta en excelente estado, PERO NO ES NUEVA y yo PAGUE POR UNA CONSOLA NUEVA, no usada. No se si me van a reembolsar, me lo van a cambiar o qué procede por que no es justo.

La edición de esta consola es realmente hermosa pues se apega al juego que representa con esos colores pastel empleados en ambos joy-cons así como en el dock con ese decorado de Tom Nook y Nendo y Tendo en la isla con el fondo color arena, el cual predomina en toda esta pieza!Los straps complementan muy bien los controles cuando se utilizan desacoplados, pues los colores de sus correas coinciden con su joy-con correspondiente!

Descepcion de consola, despues de 6 meses, ya no sirve bien el joystick y uno de los joycons ya se destraba con poquita precion, malisima calidad, juegos caros, y juegos malisimos que en otras consolas salieron hace años y nintendo quiere hacer su agosto con los relaunch, no lo compren encerio, los juegos que son gratis en el celular en la tienda nintendo los vende carisimos, los juegos que si son baratos son malisimos y son calidad de celular de hace 5 años

Comprei o New Nintendo Switch vendido pela BalbinoShop. O produto foi entregue no prazo, no entanto, tem sido mais fonte de frustração do que de divertimento. Em 20 dias de uso, só foi possível usá-lo em duas ocasiões, porque o aparelho constantemente trava na tela inicial ou nas telas laranja e azul. O desligamento total pelo acionamento do botão superior na tela, orientado pelo fabricante, não funciona. A única forma de desligá-lo completamente é esperar que a bateria se esgote, o que leva dias, para então carregá-lo e eventualmente dar de cara com telas travadas mais uma vez. E no meio desta pandemia, o atendimento na assistência Nintendo está suspenso. Então o produto se encontra sem uso. Me pergunto se o produto entregue foi entregue íntegro e em perfeitas condições de funcionamento pelo vendedor da Amazon. Vamos precisar esperar a avaliação da assistência Nintendo, quando o atendimento for regularizado.

During this time, it's incredibly hard to order this item. But if you sit for long enough and refresh the page, you'll get one! And it's worth it!This console feels fantastic, and in my opinion, it is perfect for light or heavy gaming. It works SO well for family gaming too. This is the best all-around console I've ever had. Now, there are a few tiny flaws, but everything has its flaws. There are hundreds of cute and super fun indie games to play, like Goose Game, Cuphead, Hyper Light Drifter, etc, and heavier stuff like Dark Souls and (soon) Bioshock. Also, it's incredibly customizable! You can get sticker skins and put a clear hard case over it (which I did!) and you can buy different colour joy cons or customize them with coloured shells (but BE CAREFUL it's very tricky to change the shells).
Got exactly what i was expecting. Good system.

Lo conseguí en el buen fin a buen precio y siendo la consola más actualizada (dura más la batería) lo usa mi hermano.Buena consola portátil y de mesa para jugar varios juegos, algunos gratuitos en la Eshop como fortnite, paladines, Kirby, asphalt 9, etc.

Probably goes without saying, but this system is great! I love that I can just pick it up and go, play full current gen games on a hand held, and just stick it back in the dock, and it's a home console again, seamlessly. It's next level, in that regard. I don't think it replaces a PS4, Xbox, or PC, but it is certainly a great addition, if not only for the exclusive Nintendo content. I mostly use it to play retro arcade games, Animal Crossing, and Tetris...oh god, the Tertis is strong with this system.If you want one, you likely won't regret getting one, it's all that Mario/Zelda goodness.

Sinceramente tenía miedo en esta compra, pero aún así me anime, estoy satisfecho con la switch, lo que más me daba miedo es que viniera maltratada la caja por consecuente qué podría estar golpeada o lastimada la switch, pero al abrir el paquete me sorprendió al ver que venía protegida con unas bolsas de aire, ya que anteriormente había leído que venían lastimadas sus cajas o no venia bien protegida. En mi caso venía bien protegida con las bolsas anteriormente dichas, la caja venía perfecta y el producto perfectamente, todo sirve como debe hasta ahorita y llevo 5 días con ella. Espero que siga así.

Es la consola revisión 1.1 que según trae más duración de la batería pero eso no lo puedo corroborar porque es la única que he tenido. El envío llegó conforme a lo esperado en tiempo y en buen estado.La consola es nueva, la caja nunca se había abierto ni tenía golpes, es decir que venía intacta. Leí en reseñas de otros compradores donde decían cosas así, hasta vi una donde le cortaron con cutter la pantalla. Yo digo que en mi caso, todo llegó perfectamente bien.

Realmente, el color de los joycons como el del dock son preciosos. Cuidadosamente pintados y con gran detalle que agradará no solo a los fans de la saga sino a cualquier fan de la consola.Tristemente esta edición es limitada y posiblemente ya no encuentren unidades originales y solamente mediante revendedores a dos o hasta tres veces su precio.

O New Nintendo Switch Cinza foi uma excelente aquisição para esse período de festas de final de ano. Não só pela diversão que seus jogos exclusivos proporcionam, como também pelo excelente modo portátil do console, que nos permite levá-lo para qualquer lugar que queiramos. O destaque do "New" vai para a bateria do console, que possui uma duração maior e carrega com mais rapidez.Talvez a única crítica que eu tenha sobre o videogame, seja em relação aos periféricos que, apesar de não-essenciais, melhoram a experiência do jogador. No caso, comprei a película pra tela, para evitar arranhões, um bom cartão de memória e fiz a assinatura anual "Switch Online", para poder usar os recursos online dos jogos da plataforma. De quebra, essa assinatura também libera uma porção de jogos de NES e SNES pra jogar quando quiser no console.

This is a fantastic console. Going from my tv to portable is seemless, and the portable screen is very good in it's own right. One minor nitpick I have is that the screen feels kind of loose in yhe dock, but that's mostly because they want the switchto come out of the dock smoothly. Overall, a great console.One thing though, getting this console on amazon is a frustrating ordeal. Other sellers buy out amazon's stock and sell it for double the price. I wanted to get the switch for it's actual price, and it took me three months and a miracle to actually get a switch before amazon's stock went out. So while the console is great, buying it on amazon is frustrating. Hopefully this will get better when the pandemic is over.

This Switch comes with everything that you need to get started: Console, TV Dock, one (1) pair of Joycons with controllers and handstraps, one (1) joycon controller grip, HDMI cable, Type C power adaptor. This console doesn't come with a memory card or game so be sure to keep this in mind as you will need to buy those separately.If you prefer to play online multiplayer games, a subscription to Nintendo Switch Club is required and a yearly subscription costs $29 CAD but also provides benefits like cloud-saving for your games and the ability to play NES and SNES games on your Switch. If you prefer not to subscribe, you can still access the Nintendo eShop to buy digital games for your Switch console and play offline.

Estaba indeciso ante comprar esta consola, pero puedo afirmar que vale la pena si eres fan de nintendo.La consola llegó en excelente estado y funciona perfectamente. El envío estuvo bien, todo perfecto y a tiempo.

Me llego la switch en excelentes condiciones, solo problemas de retraso de 4 dias en envío, llego al día siguiente que lo enviaron,  es comprensible con el tema del COVID en este momento. La switch esta funcionando perfecto, ya tengo una semana usandola.Se la compre a amazon directamente, nada de terceros.

Lo compré para mi sobrino y el es quien lo usa en modo portátil, no hemos hecho pruebas con cronómetro, pero al parecer sí dura aproximadamente 9 horas la batería. La consola no se calienta mucho, tiene ventilador pero es silencioso. Otra cosa que llamó mi atención es que la consola conectada a la TV da muy buena nitidez, mucho mejor que en los videos de distintas plataformas.Recomiendo una tarjeta micro SD de 256 GB mínimo, ya que los juegos exigentes pesan como 15 GB o más, entonces con una de 128 no te cabrían ni 10 juegos.

Boa variedade de jogos, os títulos da Nintendo são divertidos (Mario Kart aqui em casa tá rolando direto!), os jogos de outras empresas são em sua maioria excelentes e é ótimo usar a portabilidade e jogar em qualquer lugar. O poder gráfico é inferior ao PS4, mas na maioria dos jogos é alto (alguns com diferença mínima) e em nada compromete a diversão. Tá difiícil é parar de jogar! Recomendado!
Excelente opción para llevar jugando a todos lados.El hecho de tener ya dos controles incluidos aporta mucho para jugar con amigos o con familia 🎮🤓

Bueno para empezar la consola llego 2 días antes de la fecha señalada, Llegó bien empaquetado cerrada, al configurarla si te pide forzosamente una tarjeta de crédito, configurarla es muy fácil y puedes aprovechar para dar de alta a más usuarios, a pesar de ser gabacha puedes configurarla en español, si manejo y tiempo de respuesta es excelente, estoy muy sastifecho con esta compra, valió la pena
La mejor consola que he comprado.Ventajas:
Me llego en perfectas condicionesDudaba un poco de ser nuevo o de que llegara

This is the best system design for a console ever. So ingenious and feels great in hand. Even docked it is smaller than any other console. But somehow, despite being the graphically inferior console and basically consisting of mostly ports, they still have the most expensive games, not to mention the most expensive accessories. Also really inconvenient that you need to dock the joycons to charge them instead being able to charge them while playing the switch in dock mode. But no worries, nintendo does offer the pro controller for only $80!!!

Une infinie de possibilité. L’aboutissement de la Wii et WiiU. Du salon au reste du monde. Seul ou entre amis.Certaines pièces semblent fragiles, mais c’est du Nintendo, ça va traverser les décennies.

I could not even get passed the initial setup menu. Purchased spare controllers to check if it was a joycon issue but it doesnt work on any controller put into the right railing. Nintendo would not help with a replacement during this time and amazon is sold out so I cannot get a replacement. Poor quality product, poor customer service.

Poco después de comprarlo ya no podía encajar el joycon azul a la consola :( no le di ningún uso rudo, no tengo hijos que fuercen la consola... y para variar esto paso en épocas navideñas, llame varias veces al soporte de nintendo latinoamerica en días supuestamente no festivos (los intente llamar toda una semana completa) y ningún operador me contestaba, ustedes dirán que por las fechas estaban ocupados y por eso ... mi solución fue hablar a nintendo de EUA y allí trataron de comunicarse con laltinoamerica y no les contestaban  :/...el caso es que me atendieron por soporte hasta enero del 2020 >:(  .... solo me quejaría del soporte de latinoamerica, la consola es hermosa pero de teja un muuuy mal sabor de boca que te hagan esperar por tanto tiempo. P.D. El joycon azul me lo repararon.

Desde niño ya tenía consolas de Nintendo, pero me cambié a Xbox cuando era adolescente se puso de moda jugar en línea. Ahora que soy adulto, viajo mucho y realmente ya no tengo tiempo para jugar juegos competitivos, busco algo portátil y casual, pero aún así entretenido. ¡El switch es justo lo que buscaba! Aparte de  que la consola es hermosa, los juegos son muy divertidos (Mario, Zelda, Smash, Megaman son mis favoritos), la consola es muy conveniente, realmente el nivel de inovación y comodidad es increíble. Creo que hoy por hoy, la mejor consola.

Es Nintendo... ¿qué se puede esperar si no lo mejor? Genial la idea de tener su propia pantalla, lo que la hace perfectamente portable, el tipo de juegos que soporta (la inmensa mayoría) son para el mercado infantil, muy caricaturescos, muy para niños. No está mal... pero se siente un tanto frágil en cuanto a materiales. Los controles están demasiado pequeños para ser usados cómodamente por un adulto (consola para niños, a fin de cuentas).Para lo que es, la calidad de materiales y el muy limitado catálogo de juegos, encuentro un contrasentido el hecho de que sea la consola más cara de las 3 grandes (Xbox, PS4 y Switch); en mi opinión está MUY sobre valorada con respecto al precio. Demasiado cara para lo que realmente es. No, no compraría la siguiente generación, prefiero mil veces comprar un PS5 o el próximo a salir Xbox.

El vídeo juego increíble, mejor que XBOX y Play por lo que ofrece, fuinciona correctamente e incruso sigue funcionando modo portátil.Lo que me dejó de funcionar 3 meses después es al modo conección a la tele, cómo que al módulo HDMI dejó de funcionar.

Excelente consola, bien empaquetada y entregada adecuadamente. La conseguí en en el buen fin junto con juego, memoria de 128 gb y accesorios todo por un excelente precio (menos de 7000).La recomiendo su adquisición solo con rebajas.

La consola es perfecta para todo tipo de personas, yo estudio y trabajo asi que en el recorrido de mi escuela al trabajo puedo jugar sin ningun problema, y cuando llegue a mi casa la conecto al dock y puedo jugar en la tele, los exclusivos que tiene son muy buenos y aun faltan muuuchos por venir y eso que no ando contando los third parties y ports que vayan a venir.Si nunca vas a conectarlo a una televisión comprate la light ya que te ahorras un dinero pero esta switch es absolutamente perfecta.
Cons to consider.1)Picture quality in TV mode is 1080p(ps4 /Xbox one x are 4K).
Todo bien en cuanto a la consola pero no puedo decir lo mismo de la caja...Se que fue cuestion de la paqueteria pero aun asi si desanima y da cosa el ver daños en la caja.
build quality is so low especially the screen, the color temperature is totally different from the original verson.even the left joysticks' weird spring noise is still not fixed.

Que mas puedo decir de la gran N, una consola muy bien pensada, solo eso de solo tener 32 gb de fabrica es muy limitante y te obliga a comprar si o si una memoria externa, ademas aunque es la nueva revisión aun se presenta el famoso drift del joycon, y no es que los sticks sean de mala calidad si no que al ser sellados excepto por donde esta la palanca se mete la basura ya sea la mugre de los dedos o polvo del ambiente lo que provoca este drift y que es muy dificil solucionar a menos que sea cambiandolo.
My great grandson was ecstatic with it. He had wanted one for a long time.
Works great! Kid likes it!
This is probably the best special edition console I’ve ever seen. Good product!
works as intended
Everything works great! Love it!
Good product
Love it, was exactly what I was looking for
Good Deal
I ordered thus product to be shipped in UAE. The product is fine and working well, however, I will never order such kind a products to be shipped to UAE, due to tax fees
kid loved it
La mejor edición especial de Nintendo Switch.Los grabados son de calidad, el color de los joycons es hermoso y el dock es precioso.
Está bien hermoso lo amo
Es una estafa, pedí un nintendo y llegaron paquete de pañales. No recomiendo que compren aquí
I only bought it to smell and sniff and it’s pretty good will be throwing away when it loses its scent

Le Nintendo Switch était le cadeau de Noël pour ma fille et... il ne fonctionne pas du tout. Il est incapable de reconnaître le Joy-Con bleu (problème connu d'ailleurs pas la compagnie) donc impossible de faire quoi que ce soit. Très décevant pour un produit aussi chère. Imaginez la déception de ma fille le jour de Noël... Produit retourné.

The Nintendo Switch is just fine. Kids are having a lot of fun with it!  However, the delivery was all wrong. The $400+ package was just dumped on the porch. Nobody rang the door. No e-mail, no phone call. So, there we were, with a big flashy "Amazon Prime" smiling box on our porch. The only thing missing was a neon sign stating: "ROB THIS PACKAGE"!!!  As a matter of fact, many packages were stolen in the neighborhood recently. Paying extra fee for sloppy delivery is just stupid. My Amazon Prime membership is no more. At least, I didn't actually pay for it. I was still in the trial period.
We love our switch to play games on and to use it to watch movies on the amazon prime app. Super simple to setup and use. Amazon had the best deal out of all retailers.

Compré la Nintendo Switch para mi hija de 6 años porque a diferencia de otras consolas, me estuvo solicitando comprarla. El empaque es muy escueto y me parece un poco burda la forma en la que tienes que conectar los joy-con a un adaptador con correa y como tienes que quitarle esas correas en el momento que deseas pegar los controles a la consola. Los joy-con se tienen que cargar, así que no es posible dejarlos siempre en modo de correa, separados de la consola, a menos que tengas un cargador, obviamente también requiere retirar el adaptador con las correas.Es muy sencillo colocar al revés los adaptadores de correa a los joy-con, así que estén atentos con sus hijos para que los conecten correctamente para evitar dañarlos, ya que son accesorios muy caros.

Llegó en buen estado la caja, el producto no mostró rasguño alguno o que aparentara haber sido usado o abierto el paquete previa a su venta y entrega, es decir llegó nuevecin, en cuanto al uso, prefiero hacerlo conectado hacia el dock que en su modo portátil, esto puede que sea debido más al habito de jugar en pantallas o monitores superiores a las 20 pulgadas de tamaño, por lo tanto me ha costado trabajo adaptarme al tamaño de la pantalla nativo de la Nintendo Switch.Lo anterior puede que se deba  a que el primer juego que usé en la consola fue el de CTR Nitro-Fueled, aunque al momento de jugar Super Kirby clash... usando la consola en su modo portátil no fue incomodo y pude apreciar bien el juego, siendo que está percepción puede ser subjetiva debido a los hábitos de juego que tenga el usuario.

It's meaningless for me to talk about how good Nintendo Switch is. It's reviews are flooded on the internet. Just want to point out the red box version has 9-hour battery life instead of 4.5 hours. Big improvement same money, so if you want to get one, this is the one to get.

Ainda não testei muito, mas até o momento as configurações, o "jogo" do Pokemon Home, controles, etc... Tudo parece de altíssima qualidade.Talvez tenha problemas pra rodar jogos mais pesados como dizem mas no momento tá tudo certo.

Probably the best design since the Pikachu version (where the joycon colors look much better than the florescent yellow ones from the retail). The subtle pattern on the back of the unit looks gorgeous, and the joycon colors are just awesome! The dock design is also very nice.Took one star because it does not include the actual game, like with other bundles.

Le produits est arrivé rapidement et en bonne condition. Vraiment intéressant comme console qui permet de jouet de plusieurs façon. Nous aurions aimé que des applications comme netflix soient disponibles dans le store par contre. Je trouve aussi la console un peu cher en rapport à la qualité des manettes surtout, d'autant plus que plusieurs jeux sont hors de prix selon moi.

Es la primer consola que compro con mi propio dinero, por lo que buscaba la mejor consola que pudiera tener en esta etapa de mi vida.Estaba decidiendo entre Nintendo Switch y PS4, y las razones principales para decirme por Nintendo fueron:

Now that I have this in my hand the whole system feels horribly designed. The games are great fun but having the controllers swap in and out different types of holders feels like it could break. All of it feels like if could break but it's designed like fisher price toy.Was well packaged and arrived undamaged. This was greatly appreciated.

Simplemente me encanta, es una excelente consola de videojuegos y con los updates de la nueva versión aún mejor, la mejor consola portátil qué hay en el mercado sin duda, en eso le gana a los demás, cómo consola de sobremesa es muy buena también, pero ahí si está por debajo de Xbox y PlayStation, yo tengo las 3 consolas y cada una tiene sus lugares donde sobresale, pero sin duda la Switch es una excelente adición al ecosistema de juego de cualquier gamer, aunque tengan cualquier otra consola, Switch se complementa excelente. Muy recomendable

Es una excelente consola, realmente puedes estar jugando cómodamente en casa y si van a ocupar la TV agarras tu Nintendo Switch y puedes seguir con tu partida en cualquier lado. En mi caso el primer día que toque los famosos joy con si se me hicieron muy frágiles, para cuidarlos mejor opte por comprar un control alambico.Gracias a la gente de Amazon, primero por sus precios tan accesibles, segundo por su excelente logística, entregan cuando dicen, sin más y tercero; hasta este momento los repartidores siempre han sido muy amables.

El tamaño es perfecto. El concepto es muy bueno. Una excelente consola. Recomiendo actualizar los controles desde ajustes del sistema para evitar cualquier problema. Los joy cons son cómodos. Incluye un grip para ambos controles que da la sensación de un control profesional. Hay gran variedad d e juegos indie en la tienda. Solo tiene 32 Gb de almacenamiento pero es ampliable. La slot para la tarjeta de memoria está detrás de la pata de soporte. Muy buen producto.

Llegó a tiempo, llegó en perfecto estado, no se dañó la caja aún que si le falta que esté mejor protegida, la compré por tecnoworld.También cabe decir que está a super precio, esta es mi segunda switch y la otra la compré aquí en México a un precio super inflado, la mejor compra que he hecho definitivamente

Me desconecte de las consolas por un buen tiempo (pc master race)  y el wii / wiiU no me llamaron la atención. El switch me se hace una excelente consola, los controles son un poco fuera de lo que estoy acostumbrado pero con el adaptador para game cube se puede jugar bien Smash y algunos que otros juegos.

Recomendada 100%!La consola llegó completamente sellada y en perfectas condiciones. Recomiendo ampliamente “comprarla y enviarla” directamente con amazon, ya que he leído comentarios negativos con otros vendedores.

Llegó en perfecto estado, bien protegido y sin ningún detalle, ese era mi temor al comprarlo por Amazon pero no hubo ningún problema. Ya tengo dos meses con el y el funcionamiento es adecuado, me alegro de haberlo comprado por aquí, tenía un muy buen descuento que superaba por mucho a las tiendas de videojuegos y departamentales.Esta consola es perfecta para viaje y su tamaño es adecuado para llevarla discretamente en cualquier bolso o mochila, además esta versión tiene más duración de batería que la anterior. Los juegos que he probado son Luigi's mansion y pokemon shield. Recomiendo totalmente la compra!

Tenía mis dudas sobre adquirir la consola con un vendedor externo a Amazon, pero el precio era irresistible.Llego en tiempo y forma, la caja un poco maltratada, pero la consola y sus accesorios en exelente estado. Sin embargo, me hace algo de ruido que la caja no contara con ningún sello y sin contar la garantía, no contaba con ningún tipo de manual ni propaganda de Nintendo...

I absolutely love the switch! I started playing it right after it was delivered today, it only had half the battery charged but still enough! Everything came in really good shape and all the parts were in plastic except the switches screen but wasnt scratched or anything. The joycons were perfect and much brighter than what I thought which is great!Packaging was perfect, it was nicely secured in a box with paper surrounding it!
It works great. Couldn't wait so I purchased it just before xmas. In store I could have purchased same system with Mario included. Unfortunately this is just the system no game included.

La consola viene bien con todo original hasta ahorita funciona perfectamente solo que en la parte de atrás los 4 tornillos están algo barridos y despintados, no sé si le sacaron componentes o se los cambiaron por genéricos si alguien pudiera comentar si noto lo mismo se los agradecería

Hay realmente pocos juegos buenos y son considerablemente costosos. La gran mayoría de mala calidad. Los joycons sí o sí terminarán descompuestos  y tendrás un dolor de cabeza buscando como arreglarlos o comprando unos nuevos. Que una consola de este costo y nivel que se descomponga a los meses (literal) ha sido la mayor molestia de los consumidores. Los pros que tiene: cumple con su función de divertirte un rato, ademas del plus de poder jugarlo portátil o en una pantalla, fuera de eso seguro otra consola sería mejor opción.

My grandson’s smile is worth the money I spent on the system he is one happy kid. It took a long time for us to get it because stock was always sold out but once I saw the system preorder I jumped on it and it even came in Early which was awesome. I definitely recommend this system and am happy we were able to get it. He is having Tons of fun with it. It has great graphics and works very well if I could give 10 stars I definitely would.

Bought this back in April during the COVID rush and the Switch was selling out like hot cakes everywhere and luckily nabbed one on Amazon. It’s worked great so far, no issues with the joycons or controls yet. One thing I have to say about the delivery though - they just left it at my front door without any heads up. Fortunately I was at home and checking periodically to receive it. I would have expected an attempt to hide or leave the package at the back porch since it’s an expensive item $400+ that could have been stolen easily.

I waited until Animal Crossing was announced to buy a switch. And although I don't regret my purchase, it's rather frustrating that the display on my console went dark within a week. Turns out Nintendo used a different manufacturer for the animal crossing switches, and some other users are also reporting the screen going black and not working in handheld mode.Called Nintendo and their repair centres are currently closed due to the pandemic. I understand that they had to switch manufacturers, but that doesn't mean the quality of their product should be less compared to their usual standard.

Switch was delivered fast and in great condition. Box was not dented, which is important for limited edition packaging. While this is one of the nicer looking switches, do take note that it does not come with the new animal crossing game. It is quite strange for a limited edition console not to come with the game that it is themed around, especially when its JPN and UK editions do.Price was gouged though. It cost $60 more than when it was first in stock here, and I thought I'd be happy to absorb it because of the game, but it didn't and I still have to fork out another $70+ for a copy of the game. Now I have an expensive console with no games to play, real bummer.

Para empezar, el vendedor me sorprendió, compré este producto en una súuuuper promoción, demasiado barato, así que tenía algo de dudas, sin embargo el producto llegó en perfecto estado y a tiempo. Respecto al producto ¡es una maravilla! Mi última consola fue el PS1, así que esto me sorprendió, mira que poder ponerlo en la pantalla y luego usarlo de manera portable, salir con él, luego regresar y ponerlo en la pantalla SMH!
Received promptly and excellent condition.  Only rated 4 as I just received it and need more time to review. Will rerate later if I enjoy it but so far good.

Buena consola portátil pero tiene sus defectos, le hace falta mejorar la calidad de la imagen inmediatamente se ven los 720p y si falta calidad de imagen a 1080p (la mayoría de los teléfonos actuales tienen mejor calidad de imagen) también hace falta mejorar la ergonomía de los controles ya que no son tan cómodos cuando están unidos a la consola

El paquete me llegó en menos de dos días, la caja de la consola está un poco decolorada, pero sin abolladuras.Una gran consola, los juegos que hay son muy divertidos y prácticamente viene lista para jugar con tu pareja o hermano, pues cada joy con son un control para la mayoría de los juegos, una lastima que el juego lo comprara por separado.

Arrived right on time for scheduled release of system on the morning of the 13th. Colours are just as gorgeous, I honestly don't want to ruin the system.... Can't wait to show it off to my friends when I bring it along with me.

A proposta do console é ótima. Essa coisa dele ser híbrido é muito interessante. O console em si não é grande coisa. Acredito que é o console mais fraco da atualidade, tem smartphones hoje muito mais poderosos. Mas é a única opção para jogar os exclusivos Nintendo. Na minha opinião é o único motivo para comprar um desses, pelo menos foi o meu. Para crianças com certeza é a melhor opção entre todos os consoles.

If you have a gaming household, this is a great addition! It's easy to set up and changing between the handheld to TV gaming set up is an easy click. The controls can be a bit tricky to sync up at first, but once you know how to do it it's really easy. It does come with a stand to turn the two remotes into a single traditional controller. They are on the small side (I wear a woman's medium glove), so if you're a large man or prefer a heavier controller getting the extra plug-in controller may be a good idea.

La mejor experiencia de juego que he tenido en años.La estoy estrenando con Zelda BOTW, Astral Chain, Celeste, Enter the Gungeon y Cuphead, y hasta el momento my única molestia (si se le puede decir así) es que los Joycon no son muy cómodos, así que estoy por pedir un control pro, definitivamente hace falta para algunos juegos (como Astral Chain y Celeste, con el Zelda cumplen los controles normales).
This console is simply amazing. The portability is awesome. Game are fun. Graphics are on point. Worth the buy !

Es sinceramente una de las mejores consolas del mundo, portátil cuando quieras ver un juego mas cara a cara y puedes conectarla a la tv cuando quieras jugar juegos con paisajes coloridos y bellos como The Legend Of Zelda Breath Of The Wild, la recomiendo totalmente, Nintendo se supera día a día.

Es una excelente consola, el concepto que ofrece la consola es muy interesante tanto la oportunidad de usarla portátil y usarla en modo sobremesa es muy bueno. Los gráficos si que es cierto no son los mejores mas sin embargo es buena. Un punto a declarar son los juegos de Nintendo y sus exclusivos.

Desde hace varios meses que ansiaba esta consola. Ahora que finalmente la tengo conmigo puedo disfrutar del inmenso catálogo de juegos que tiene, tanto first party como de third party. Dentro o fuera de mi casa. Puede que esta consola no sea la más potente de la generacion.
